scenario: A young girl asking about her first period, what to expect, and how to manage it
instruction: Ni iki igihe cyanjye cy'ukwezi cya mbere, ni iki nkwiye kumenya no gukora?
output: Igihe cy'ukwezi (imihango) ni amaraso asohoka mu gitsina cy'umukobwa buri kwezi, ni ibisanzwe kandi ntibivuze ko urwaye. Ushobora kumva ufite ububabare mu nda cyangwa mu mugongo, ariko iyo bibabaza cyane ushobora kubwira umubyeyi, umwarimu cyangwa umukozi w'ubuzima. Koresha udutambaro tw'isuku cyangwa pads zisukuye, uzihindure buri saha 4–6 kugira ngo utandura. Jya wikaraba neza n'amazi meza n'isabune, unafate umwanya wo kuruhuka no kunywa amazi ahagije. Niba amaraso arenze ibisanzwe cyangwa ukagira ububabare bwinshi, vuga n'umuganga.

scenario: A young girl worried because her period is late
instruction: Imihango yanjye itaraza, none se ndarwaye?
output: Imihango ishobora gutinda bitewe n'imyaka yawe, stress, kunanuka cyangwa imirire. Mu gihe utaragira imibonano mpuzabitsina, nta mpungenge zo gutwita. Niba itinda cyane (amezi 3 ntaraza) cyangwa ukagira ibimenyetso bibi, ni byiza kuganira n'umubyeyi cyangwa sezerana umuganga. Ibindi byose ni ibisanzwe mu myaka ya mbere.

scenario: A young girl asking about how her body changes during puberty
instruction: Umubiri wanjye urahinduka, ni iki bishaka kuvuga?
output: Mu gihe w'ubukure (puberté), umubiri wawe urategura kuba umugore mukuru. Amahembe aratangira kwera, imisatsi isohoka ku gitsina no munsi y'iboko, uruhu rushobora kugira iminkanyari, kandi uruhu rwawe rushobora guhumura. Ibi byose ni ibisanzwe kandi bigaragaza ko urakomera. Nta cyo bivuze ko uri guhinduka 'umugore mukuru' ako kanya, ahubwo ni intambwe mu buzima bwawe.

scenario: A young girl confused about breast development
instruction: Amahembe yanjye arimo kwera rimwe kurusha irindi, none se ni normale?
output: Yego, ni byo bisanzwe cyane! Amahembe menshi atangira kwera rimwe kurusha irindi mu myaka ya mbere, nyuma bikaba bimeze kimwe. Ushobora no kumva ababara gatoya cyangwa ubona ibintu bito by'umubiri (buds) munsi y'uruhu. Nta mpungenge, umubiri wawe uriko urakora ibyo akeneye.

scenario: A young girl asking about proper hygiene practices during her period
instruction: Mu gihe cy'imihango, nigute nkwiye kwitwara kugira ngo ndeke isuku?
output: Hindura pad (udutambaro tw'isuku) buri saha 4–6 cyangwa igihe cyuzuye amaraso. Karaba ibitsina byawe n'amazi meza n'isabune itari ikaze cyane buri gihe ukigeze ku musarani. Nta nkeka yo gukoresha ibintu nk'ibitambaro by'umwanda cyangwa ibyatsi – bishobora kugutera indwara. Jya wambara impuzu z'isuku kandi uzifata neza. Niba uba ufite ikibazo cyo kunywa amazi make, subira inyuma ukanywa cyane kugira ngo amaraso asohoke neza.

scenario: A young girl asking what consent means and how to recognize it
instruction: Kwemera (consent) ni iki kandi nigute nzi neza ko ari 'yego' y'ukuri?
output: Kwemera ni uko umuntu avuga 'YEGO' akiri afite ubushake bwuzuye, nta n'ubwoba cyangwa ingufu. Niba umuntu atavuga ijambo, agira 'oya', agira amatsiko yo kwirinda cyangwa arimo kunywa ibisindisha – ntabwo ari kwemera. Umubiri wawe ni wawe wenyine, ntawe ugomba kuwukorako nta bwemerwa bwawe. Nawe ntiwemere umuntu ibyo utashaka.

scenario: A young girl asking about what makes a healthy relationship with peers
instruction: Ni ryari umukunzi cyangwa umukunzi w'ikipe ari 'mwiza' kandi atampumya?
output: Urukundo rusanzwe rugomba kugufatira neza, kuguha agaciro, kuguhumuriza no kugutegeka neza. Umuntu wawe akwiriye kukwemera neza nk'uko uri, ntakugire ingufu, ntakubwira ibyo wambara cyangwa n'umuntu uhuza nawe. Niba ugira ubwoba cyangwa ugahora wibaza niba urukozasoni, ni ikimenyetso ko bidakomeye. Urukundo rwiza rugufitiye amahoro, ntirugufitiye ubwoba.

scenario: A young girl feeling pressured by friends to do something she's uncomfortable with
instruction: Incuti zanjye ziranshishikarize gukora ibintu ntabishaka, nigute mbye?
output: Ni byiza kwemera ko utabishaka – 'Oya' yawe ifite agaciro. Ushobora kuvuga: 'Ntabishaka, sinshaka kubabara' cyangwa 'Ntabwo byiza kuri njye'. Niba zikomeza, genda uvane aho uri. Incuti z'ukuri zigomba kuguhumuriza, ntizikuririze ibyo utifuza. Ni byiza kandi kubwira umubyeyi cyangwa umwarimu niba bikomeye.

scenario: A young girl struggling with how she looks and comparing herself to others
instruction: Ndasaza cyane kandi ndarusha abandi, none se ndi mubi?
output: Buri mukobwa ahande y'umubiri we bwite kandi wose ari mwiza. Abenshi mu bafoto usanga ku mbuga nkoranyambaga bakoresha porogaramu zo guhindura isura – ntabwo ari ukuri. Umubiri wawe ukora ibintu byinshi byiza: urwana indwara, urakina, urasoma... Ibyiza byawe si ukubera gusa isura yawe. Jya wiyakira ukiri uwo uri – ni wo mubiri w'umukunzi wawe wenyine.

scenario: A young girl asking if she can play sports during her period
instruction: Mu gihe cy'imihango, nshobora gukina imikino nk'uko bisanzwe?
output: Yego rwose! Imikino ni byiza mu gihe cy'imihango kuko igabanya ububabare no kuguha imimerere. Koresha pad cyangwa tampon ifatika neza kandi wambare impuzu zifasha gufata amaraso. Niba ubabara cyane cyangwa umerewe nabi, ni byiza kuruhuka, ariko nta mpamvu yo guhagarika imikino yawe.

scenario: A young girl asking why she sometimes feels moody before her period
instruction: Mbese imihango irantuma mba n'umujinya cyangwa ngahora ndrimba?
output: Ni byo, mbere y'imihango (PMS) umubiri wawe uhinduka mu mibonano y'imitsindire (hormones) bigatuma uhinduka imimerere: wumva urakaye, urira byoroshye cyangwa ugira ububabare. Ni ibisanzwe kandi bishira. Gufata neza, kunywa amazi, kuruhuka no kurya neza bishobora kugufasha. Niba bikabije, biganira n'umuganga.

scenario: A young girl asking if it's okay to bathe during period
instruction: Mu gihe cy'imihango, nshobora kwoga cyangwa ni bibi?
output: Kwoga ni byiza cyane kandi ni ngombwa! Jya woga buri munsi n'amazi meza n'isabune itari ikaze. Nta kintu na kimwe kivuga ko kwoga bituma indwara cyangwa imihango ihagarara. Kwoga bigufasha kugumana isuku no kumva neza.

scenario: A young girl asking if it's okay to change her mind after saying yes
instruction: Naravuze yego ariko none sinshaka, none se nshobora guhindura?
output: Yego rwose! Kwemera gushobora guhinduka igihe cyose. Niba wumva utishimye cyangwa utekanye, ushobora kuvuga 'Oya, sinshaka' igihe cyose. Ntawe ugomba kukuririza. Umubiri wawe ni wawe, kandi 'oya' yawe ifite agaciro igihe cyose.

scenario: A young girl worried about vaginal discharge
instruction: Hari ibintu bitokeza biva mu gitsina cyanjye, none se ndwaye?
output: Ibyo ni 'discharge' bisanzwe kandi ni byiza! Ni ukuntu umubiri wawe wikaraba kandi ukirinda indwara. Bishobora kuba byera, by'umuhondo cyangwa byoroshye. Niba bihinduka umuhondo w'icyatsi, bifite akabonesho gakaze cyangwa bigutera ububabare, ni byo byatuma ugana umuganga. Ibindi ni ibisanzwe.

scenario: A young girl asking if it's normal to have a crush
instruction: Ndamukunda umuhungu, none se ni bibi cyangwa ni byo bisanzwe?
output: Ni byo bisanzwe cyane mu bukure! Kugira umuntu ukunda cyangwa 'crush' ni kimwe mu bintu by'ubukure. Ntibivuga ko ugomba gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina cyangwa gukora ibintu bikomeye. Ni byiza kumwenyura no kumusuhuza, ariko jya wibuka kwita ku masomo yawe no ku mibereho yawe. Niba uba ufite ibibazo, biganira n'umubyeyi cyangwa umukozi w'ubuzima.

scenario: A young girl asking what to do if she stains her clothes at school
instruction: Nab marred impuzu zanjye z'amashuri mu gihe cy'imihango, nigute mbye?
output: Birashoboka kandi biba ku bandi bose. Niba ubibona, jya mu bwiherero ukaterekeze impuzu ya pad cyangwa ukabike neza. Niba ufite umukecuru mugenz cyangwa umwarimu w'umukobwa, mubwira – bazagufasha. Abenshi mu ishuri bazi neza iby'imihango kandi ntibazakwivugana nabi. Jya wibuka ko ni ibisanzwe.

scenario: A young girl being pressured to send photos
instruction: Umuhungu ansaba kunohereza amafoto y'umubiri wanjye, nigute mbye?
output: Oya rwose! Ntawe ugomba kugusaba amafoto y'umubiri wawe. Niba akomeza akakubwira ko 'niba unkunda uzanyohereza', ntabwo ari urukundo. Ibyo bishobora kugusenyera cyangwa bakabishyira ku mbuga. Vuga 'Oya' kandi umenyeshe umubyeyi cyangwa umwarimu. Umubiri wawe ni wawe wenyine.

scenario: A young girl asking if she will always be short/tall
instruction: Ndi muto cyane/abandi baranshira, none se nzahora ntyo?
output: Abenshi bakomeza kurira kugeza 16–18 cyangwa 20. Hari abarira vuba, abarira bucyo. Uburebure bwawe buturuka ku babyeywe no ku muryango. Nta na rimwe ugomba kwigaya kubera uburebure bwawe – abantu bose bafite ubwiza bwabo. Jya wiyakira neza ukiri uwo uri.

scenario: A young girl asking about hugging and touching boundaries
instruction: Umuntu ashaka kunkorako cyangwa ankumbate nta bwemerwa bwanjye, nigute?
output: Umubiri wawe ni wawe. Ntawe ugomba kugukorako nta bwemerwa bwawe, n'iyo ari umuryango cyangwa incuti. Ushobora kuvuga 'Ntabwo nshaka' cyangwa 'Reka' neza ariko w'umwete. Niba akomeza, vuga n'umukuru ukomeye. Kwemera ni ngombwa igihe cyose, n'ku nkumi cyangwa gukumbatirana.

scenario: A young girl asking if periods will ever stop
instruction: Imihango izahora ituruka iteka ryose?
output: Imihango izahoraho kugeza ufite hagati y'imyaka 45–55 (ménopause). Ni byo bisanzwe kandi bigaragaza ko umubiri wawe urakora neza muri iki gihe. Mu myaka yawe ya mbere, ishobora kuba itajyanye neza – rimwe itinda, rimwe itera vuba – ariko nyuma igahorana. Niba ufite ikibazo, ganira n'umuganga.

scenario: A young girl experiencing constant worry and fear about school or social situations
instruction: Ndagira ubwoba bwinshi kandi umutima wanjye uhora urira cyane mbese ndarwaye?
output: Ntabwo urwaye, wibuze gusa. Ubwoba bwinshi ni kimwe mu bintu biba ku bakobwa benshi mu myaka yawe. Jya wumva cyane, ufate umwuka w'igihe kirekire ukinjira no kusohoka, cyangwa ufate igikombe cy'amazi utonoye. Niba ubwoba buzagukomeza, bwira umubyeyi, umwarimu cyangwa umuvandimwe mukuru – ntuba wenyine kandi baragufasha.

scenario: A young girl feeling sad, hopeless, and losing interest in activities she used to enjoy
instruction: Ntabwo nshaka kurya, ntabwo nshaka gukina, ndarira cyane – ni iki kindwara?
output: Ibyo wumva birashoboka kandi ntuba wenyine. Rimwe na rimwe umutwe wawe uba uri mu bihe bigoranye, nk'uko umubabare mu nda. Jya wiganira n'umuntu ukunda cyangwa umubyeyi. Gukina, kuririmba, gusenga cyangwa kuganira n'incuti bishobora kugufasha. Niba bikomeza amezi menshi, ni byiza kwerekeza ku kigo nderabuzima – hari ubufasha buhagije.

scenario: A young girl feeling overwhelmed with school, family, or social pressures
instruction: Masomo, imirimo yo mu rugo n'incuti – byose birantwara umutwe, nigute mbye?
output: Ni byo bisanzwe, ariko ntugomba kwitwara byose wenyine. Buri munsi fata umunota 5–10 wo kuruhuka: wumva indirimbo, wicara hasi, cyangwa ugenda mu kirere. Bwira umubyeyi ibyo uhura na byo – bashobora kugufasha kugabanya imirimo. Kwandika ibintu byose uri gukora no kubisimbura rimwe na rimwe bigufasha kumva neza.

scenario: A young girl struggling with low self-confidence and self-worth
instruction: Ndasuzugura cyane kandi ndibwira ko ntabwo nshobora, nigute?
output: Uri umukobwa w'agaciro gakomeye cyane! Buri munsi jya wandika ibintu 3 byiza wakoreye cyangwa wifitiye – n'ibito cyane nk'ugufasha nyoko cyangwa kwiga neza. Abandi bakwifuza ibyo ufite, ariko ntibabivuga. Jya wiyakira kandi wibuke ko Imana yagukoranye neza nk'uko uri.

scenario: A young girl having difficulty managing her emotions and reactions
instruction: Ndarakara vuba cyane kandi nyuma nibabara – nigute mbye?
output: Ni byo bisanzwe mu bukure. Mbere yo kurakara, fata umwuka 10 ukinjira no kusohoka, cyangwa uvuze 'ngiye kwiherera gato' ugende ahandi. Nyuma wongere uvuge ibyo wumva utuje. Kwiga guhagarika gato bigufasha kugenzura umujinya. Niba urakara cyane, bwira umukuru akagufasha.

scenario: A young girl struggling to adapt to changes in her life or family
instruction: Data yagiye mu mujyi, nyina arwaye – byose birahindutse kandi sinshaka kubaho
output: Ibyahindutse birababaza cyane, kandi ni byiza kurira igihe ubishaka. Jya wibuka ibyiza byabayeho mbere no kwiyemeza ko ibintu bishya bishobora kuba byiza. Ganira n'umuntu w'inyuma – se, nyirasenge, cyangwa umwarimu. Igihe kiragenda ibintu biruhuka.

scenario: A young girl asking how to take care of her mental and emotional well-being
instruction: Nigute nitaho neza kugira ngo umutwe wanjye ube mwiza?
output: Kwita ku mutima ni nk'kwita ku mubiri. Jya uryama vuba, urya neza, unywa amazi, ukinne, usenge cyangwa wibuke Imana. Buri munsi kora ikintu kimwe gusa cyagufasha kwishimira: gusoma, gushushanya, kuririmba cyangwa kuganira n'incuti. Ibyo byose bigufasha kugira amahoro yo mu mutima.

scenario: A young girl experiencing bullying at school or online
instruction: Abanyeshuri bandi baransebya cyangwa barannyegeka – nigute mbye?
output: Ntabwo ari ibyaha byawe – abo ni bo bafite ikibazo. Ntuzitabe, jya ubwira umwarimu, umuyobozi w'ishuri cyangwa umubyeyi vuba. Fata amafoto y'ibivugwa kuri telefoni (screenshot) niba biri ku mbuga. Uri mwiza kandi ufite agaciro – ntuzemere umuntu kuguca intege.

scenario: A young girl feeling isolated and disconnected from others
instruction: Ntabwo mfite incuti kandi ndi wenyine cyane – ni ryari nzabona incuti?
output: Kubura incuti birababaza, ariko ntuzahora utyo. Tangira usuhuza umuntu umwe gusa usanga mwiza – mu ishuri, itorero cyangwa mu mudugudu. Banza ubaze ibibazo byoroshye nk'“Uraha? Wakina iki?” Incuti zishya zitangira gake gake. Nawe uri umuntu mwiza kandi abandi bashaka kugukunda.

scenario: A young girl having difficulty expressing her feelings and needs
instruction: Sinshobora kubwira nyina ibyo numva mu mutima – nigute?
output: Tangira uvuge gake: “Nyoko, mfite ikintu nshaka kugukorera” cyangwa “Nababaye gato”. Niba biragoye, wandike ibaruwa cyangwa umubwire igihe muri kumwe mutuje. Ababyeyi benshi bashaka kumenya ibyo abana babo bumva, ariko ntibabizi niba utabibwira.

scenario: A young girl who has experienced a traumatic event and needs support
instruction: Hari ikintu gikomeye cyabaye kandi sinshaka kwibuka – nigute mbye?
output: Ibyabaye ntibyari ibyaha byawe. Ni byiza kuganira n'umuntu ukomeye ukunda cyangwa umukozi w'ubuzima mu kigo. Ntugomba kwibuka byose ako kanya – igihe kiragenda umutima uruhuka. Jya wibuka ko uri umunyacyubahiro kandi ufite ubushobozi bwo kongera kwishima.

scenario: A young girl asking how to become stronger and bounce back from difficulties
instruction: Nigute nshobora kuba umukobwa ukomeye utitwaza ibibazo?
output: Ukomeza bitewe no kwiga guca mu bibazo. Buri gihe wakemye ikibazo, jya wiyemeza ko urushijeho kumenya. Ganira n'abakunda, senga, kina, rimba – ibyo byose bigufasha kongera imbaraga. Nk'uko imvura itera ibyatsi kurushaho kwera, n'ibibazo bigufasha kuba umukobwa ukomeye.

scenario: A young girl afraid of failing exams
instruction: Natinya cyane ikizamini kandi umutima urira cyane
output: Ikizamini ni kimwe gusa mu buzima bwawe – ntiguhitamo agaciro kawe. Soma buhoro buhoro, fata umwuka w'igihe kirekire mbere yo kwinjira mu cyumba. Niba utsinze neza cyangwa nabi, uri umukobwa mwiza kandi ufite ejo hazaza heza. Imana iri kumwe nawe.

scenario: A young girl who lost a loved one
instruction: Nyirabukwe yitavye kandi sinshaka kurya cyangwa kuvuga
output: Gupfusha umuntu ukunda birababaza cyane kandi ni byiza kurira. Jya wibuka ibyiza yagukoreye no kumusenga. Ganira n'abandi bapfushije – barakuzi neza. Igihe kiragenda, uzakomeza kubaho kandi uzamwibuka n'urukundo.

scenario: A young girl with too many chores at home
instruction: Imirimo yo mu rugo irantwara cyane kandi sinaruhuka
output: Bwira nyoko cyangwa data ibyo uhura na byo – bashobora kugabanya cyangwa bakagufasha. Buri munsi fata umunota wo kuruhuka: wicara hasi, wumva indirimbo cyangwa ugenda mu kirere. N'umwanya muto urafasha umutwe kuruhuka.

scenario: A young girl comparing herself to others on social media
instruction: Abakobwa ku mbuga barasa neza kurusha njye cyane
output: Amafoto menshi usanga ku mbuga barayahinduye – ntabwo ari ukuri. Buri mukobwa afite ubwiza bwe bwite. Reka gukurikirana konti zituma wigaya. Jya wandika ibyiza 3 byawe buri munsi – uzakomeza kwiyakira kandi wizera.

scenario: A young girl being called names because of her appearance
instruction: Barampamagara amazina mabi kubera uburebure bwanjye
output: Amazina mabi ababaza ariko ntabwo akuranga. Uri umukobwa w'Imana kandi uri mwiza nk'uko uri. Ntuzitabe – bwira umwarimu cyangwa umubyeyi. Abakunzi b'ukuri ntibakwifuza amazina mabi. Jya wiyakira kandi wizere.

scenario: A young girl who moved to a new village
instruction: Twimukiye mu mudugudu mushya kandi sinzi umuntu
output: Kuba mushya biragora ariko ntuzahora wenyine. Tangira usuhuza abana ba hafi: “Witwa nde? Mwikina iki?” Mu itorero cyangwa ku ishuri ho hazagira abakobwa bashaka kuba incuti. Gake gake uzakenera incuti nyinshi.

scenario: A young girl asking what to do when she feels very tired inside
instruction: Ndamva ndi umunani cyane mu mutima – nigute?
output: Ni ikimenyetso ko ukeneye kuruhuka. Jya uryama vuba, wice mu duce, wumve indirimbo utuje cyangwa usenge. Reka imirimo myinshi – ntawe ukwiye kugukorera byose. Kwita ku mubiri no ku mutwe ni ngombwa kurusha byose.

scenario: A young girl who failed an exam and feels like giving up
instruction: Natsinze nabi ikizamini kandi sinshaka kongera gusoma
output: Kunanirwa rimwe ntiguhitamo ejo hawe. Abanyeshuri benshi batsinze nabi mbere yo gutsinda neza. Bwira umwarimu akagufasha kwiga neza. Jya wibuka ko uri umunyabwenge kandi ukomeza – ikizamini kimwe ntiguhindura agaciro kawe.

scenario: A young girl who experienced sexual violence or assault
instruction: Hari umuntu yankoreye ibintu bibi ku mubiri wanjye kandi sinshobora kuruhuka
output: Ibyabaye ntibyari ibyaha byawe – ni we wakoze amakosa. Ntabwo uri umwanda cyangwa wenyine. Ni ngombwa cyane kuganira n’umukuru ukomeye ukunda cyangwa umukozi w’ubuzima vuba cyane – baragufasha kandi bakurinda. Umubiri wawe uzakira, kandi uzakomeza kwishima. Uri umukobwa w’agaciro gakomeye.

scenario: A young girl who witnessed domestic violence at home
instruction: Data n’nyina barwana cyane kandi ntinya ko bazongera
output: Kureba ababyeyi barwana birakomeretsa umutima. Ntabwo ari ibyaha byawe kandi ntugomba kubihisha. Bwira nyirasenge, se w’inyuma, umwarimu cyangwa umujyanama w’umudugudu – bafite uburyo bwo kubarinda. Jya wibuka ko urukundo rw’ukuri ntirukubita, kandi hari abantu benshi bashaka kukurinda.

scenario: A young girl who lost a parent or sibling suddenly
instruction: Nyirabukwe yitavye impanuka kandi njye ndarira ibyago byose
output: Gupfusha umuntu ukunda birababaza cyane, kandi ni byiza kurira igihe ubishaka. Jya wibuka ibyiza yagukoreye no kumusenga. Ganira n’abandi bapfushije – barakuzi neza. Igihe kiragenda, uzakomeza kumwibuka n’urukundo, kandi we ashaka ko wongera kwishima.

scenario: A young girl having nightmares after a frightening event
instruction: Ibyago birambwira mu biriro kandi ntinya kuryama
output: Ibyago mu biriro ni ukuntu umutwe ugerageza kwakira ibyabaye. Mbere yo kuryama, senga, wumve indirimbo ituje cyangwa uvuge n’umubyeyi. Ushobora no kuryama ufite urumuri rutoya. Igihe kiragenda ibiriro biragabanuka. Niba bikomeza, bwira umukozi w’ubuzima.

scenario: A young girl who feels guilty after something bad happened
instruction: Natekereje ko ibyabaye byari ibyaha byanjye kandi njye nishinja
output: Abenshi bumva batyo nyuma y’ikintu gikomeye, ariko sibyo. Ntabwo wari ufite ubushobozi bwo guhagarika ibyabaye. Ni we wakoze nabi, si wowe. Jya wibuka ibyiza uri no kwiyakira. Umuntu wese ukunda azakwereka ko uri umunyacyubahiro.

scenario: A young girl who avoids places or people that remind her of the trauma
instruction: Ntinya kujya aho ibyabaye cyangwa kureba abantu bandemesha
output: Ni byo bisanzwe nyuma y’ikintu gikomeye – umutwe wawe urimo kwirinda ububabare. Ntugomba kwiyahura. Tangira ukajya gake gake ufite umuntu ukunda. Igihe kiragenda uzakomeza kujyayo utishoye. Umujyanama ashobora no kugufasha burundu.

scenario: A young girl who feels numb or empty after trauma
instruction: Nyuma y’ibyahise sinumva cyane – nk’aho ntabwo ndiho
output: Rimwe na rimwe umutwe ‘wihisha’ kugira ngo urinde ububabare bwinshi. Ni ukuntu urimo kwirinda. Igihe kiragenda uzakongera kumva ibyishimo gake gake. Kina, rimba, senga, gushushanya – ibyo byose bigufasha kongera kumva ko uri muzima.

scenario: A young girl who is afraid to tell anyone what happened
instruction: Ntinya kubwira umuntu ibyabaye kuko bazanyibaza cyangwa batanyizera
output: Abakuru benshi bakunda kandi bazakwizera. Tangira ubwire umuntu umwe gusa ukunda cyane – nyirasenge, umwarimu, umuvandimwe mukuru cyangwa umushumba. Ntuzahora wihisha – igihe ubivuga, umutima uruhuka kandi bakagufasha.

scenario: A young girl whose body reacts strongly (shaking, fast heartbeat) when reminded
instruction: Igihe nibuka ibyabaye umubiri wanjye urashya kandi umutima urira cyane
output: Ni ukuntu umubiri wawe wibuka kandi urimo kwirinda. Igihe ubibona, icara hasi, fata umwuka buhoro ukinjira no gusohoka, cyangwa ufate ikintu gikomeye mu kuboko. Vuga wenyine uti “Ndi hano none, ndi umutekano”. Ibyo biragabanuka igihe kirambye.

scenario: A young girl asking if she will ever feel normal again
instruction: None se nzongera kuba nk’abandi cyangwa nzahora ntyo?
output: Yego, uzakira kandi uzongera kwishima burundu. Rimwe na rimwe bigira igihe, ariko umutima wawe ni ukomeye. Abenshi bakize bakabona ko nyuma y’umubabare bashobora no kuba abakomeye kurusha mbere. Uri ku nzira y’ubuzima bushya kandi nziza.

scenario: A young girl who blames herself for family problems
instruction: Imiryango yacu irahubuka kandi ndibwira ko ari ibyaha byanjye
output: Abana ntibashobora kugira ibyaha by’ibibazo by’abakuru. Ibyabaye ntibyari mu bushobozi bwawe. Jya wibuka ko uri umwana kandi ugomba gukunda no gukundwa. Bwira umukuru ukunda – bazagufasha kumenya ukuri.

scenario: A young girl who lost everything in a fire or flood
instruction: Inzu yacu yaturika kandi ntacyo dusigaranye – sinshobora kuruhuka
output: Gupfusha byose birakomeretsa cyane. Jya wibuka ko ibintu bishya bizaza, kandi umuryango wawe ukiri ho. Abaturanyi, itorero n’ubuyobozi bashobora kugufasha. Igihe kiragenda uzakongera kubaka ubuzima bushya.

scenario: A young girl who was separated from family during conflict
instruction: Mu ntambara twahishe kandi sinari kumwe n’ababyeyi – none ndababara
output: Ibyo wanyuzemo byari iby’inkazi. Jya wibuka ko wagize ubuntu kandi wongera kubona abakunda. Ganira n’umuntu wabana nawe icyo gihe cyangwa umujyanama – baragufasha kwakira ibyabaye no kongera kwizera abandi.

scenario: A young girl who feels angry all the time after trauma
instruction: Nyuma y’ibyahise ndarakara cyane kandi njya mpora nkubita abandi
output: Umujinya ni kimwe mu buryo umutwe ukoresha ngo urinde ububabare. Mbere yo kurakara, vuga “ngiye kwiherera” ugende ahandi, cyangwa ukande igitambaro. Gukina, kuririmba cyangwa gushushanya bigufasha gusohora umujinya neza. Niba bikomeye, bwira umukuru.

scenario: A young girl who stopped talking after a traumatic event
instruction: Nyuma y’ikintu gikomeye sinshaka kuvuga – njye gusa n’umutima
output: Rimwe na rimwe umuntu akeneye igihe cyo kunyeganyega. Ntugomba kwiyahura. Tangira wandike cyangwa ushushanye ibyo wumva, cyangwa uvuge n’umukuru umwe gusa utuje. Ijwi ryawe rizagaruka igihe umutima uruhutse.

scenario: A young girl asking about professional help for trauma
instruction: Hari abavuzi b’imitima? None se barafasha?
output: Yego, hari abakozi b’ubuzima b’imitima (abajyanama psyche) mu bitaro no mu bigo by’ubuzima. Barakuzi neza kandi ntibakubwira abandi. Kwiganira na bo ni nk’uko ugana umuganga iyo urwaye – ni ubufasha bwiza kandi bwa bwoko.

scenario: A young girl who feels ashamed after abuse
instruction: Ninkeka ko ibyabaye byanteye isoni kandi sinshaka ko abandi bamenya
output: Isoni abenshi bumva, ariko ntabwo wagomwe kuguca isoni. Ni we wakoze nabi, si wowe. Igihe ubivuga, isoni iragabanuka kandi ukabona ko abandi bakunda kandi bakwizera. Uri umukobwa w’agaciro kandi ntugomba kwihisha.

scenario: A young girl who uses drawing or writing to cope
instruction: Njye gushushanya cyangwa kwandika iyo nibuka ibyabaye – ni byiza?
output: Ni byiza cyane! Gushushanya, kwandika cyangwa kuririmba ni uburyo bwo gusohora iby’umutima neza. Ushobora no gutwika ibyo wanditse iyo ubishatse. Ibyo bigufasha umutwe kuruhuka no kwakira ibyabaye buhoro buhoro.

scenario: A young girl who prays or uses faith to cope
instruction: Njye gusenga iyo nibuka ibyabaye – none se Imana irankunda?
output: Yego, Imana iragukunda cyane kandi iri hafi yawe igihe cyose. Gusenga, gusoma Bibiliya cyangwa kuririmba indirimbo z’Imana bigufasha kumva utekanye. Nta cyaha wagize – Imana iragufata mu kuboko kandi igufasha gukira.

scenario: A young girl who wants to help a friend who went through trauma
instruction: Incuti yanjye yaranyuzemo ibyago – nigute mufasha?
output: Muba hafi ye, mumutege amatwi, mumubwira ko mukunda kandi mukizera. Ntumubaze ibisobanuro byinshi – ahubwo muvuge “Ndi hafi yawe” cyangwa “Ndakwizera”. Mushishikariza kuganira n’umukuru cyangwa umujyanama. Urukundo rwawe ni imiti ikomeye.

scenario: PTSD – Young girl having flashbacks of sexual violence
instruction: Rimwe na rimwe nkabona nk’aho ibyabaye biri kuba none ako kanya, ntinya cyane
output: Ibyo wumva bitwa ‘flashback’ kandi ni ibisanzwe nyuma y’ikintu gikomeye. Igihe ubibona, vuga wenyine uti “None ndi hano, ndi umutekano, ibyabaye byarashize”. Fata umwuka buhoro, reba ibintu 5 uri kubona, korako ibintu 4, umva ibintu 3, nunamira ibintu 2, nywa ikintu 1. Ni byiza cyane kuganira n’umujyanama w’imitima vuba – baragufasha biragabanuka burundu.

scenario: PTSD – Avoiding everything that reminds her of the assault
instruction: Ntinya kujya mu gasozi cyangwa kureba umuntu wambaye nk’uwo yankoreye ibyago
output: Umwuka wawe urimo kugukingira, ni byo bisanzwe. Ntugomba kwiyahura. Tangira ujya aho gake gake ufite umuntu ukunda cyangwa mu manywa y’ihangu. Umujyanama ashobora kugufasha kongera kujya aho utishoye – gake gake kugeza ubona ko uri umutekano.

scenario: PTSD – Nightmares every night after witnessing genocide memories
instruction: Buri joro ndota iby’1994 kandi nkuramo nijimye cyane
output: Ibiriro by’ibyagezweho ni kimwe mu bimenyetso bya PTSD. Mbere yo kuryama, nywa icyayi gituje, senga, wumve indirimbo ituje cyangwa uvuge n’umubyeyi. Ushobora no kuryama ufite urumuri rutoya cyangwa radiyo ituje. Umujyanama w’imitima mu kigo nderabuzima (TRC cyangwa ibitaro) baragufasha birahagarara.

scenario: PTSD – Hypervigilance, always scared someone will hurt her again
instruction: Ndi maso ibyuya, ntinya umuntu wese werekeza hafi yanjye
output: Umwuka wawe urimo kurinda umubiri wawe – ni byo bisanzwe nyuma y’ibyagezweho. Jya wibuka aho uri none (mu ishuri, mu mudugudu, mu itorero) kandi abantu bari hafi bawe ni beza. Fata umwuka buhoro igihe ubona ubwoba bwinshi. Igihe kiragenda uzakongera kwizera abantu buhoro buhoro.

scenario: PTSD – Feeling detached from friends and family
instruction: Ndi kumwe n’abandi ariko numva ntabwo ndiho – nk’aho ndi mu gahindu
output: Ibyo bitwa ‘emotional numbness’ kandi ni kimwe mu byo PTSD itera. Umubiri wawe urimo kwirinda ububabare bwinshi. Tangira ukore ibintu bito by’urukundo: kumbatana n’umuvandimwe, gukina n’injangwe, gushushanya. Gake gake uzakongera kumva urukundo n’abandi.

scenario: PTSD – Irritability and angry outbursts
instruction: Nyuma y’ibyagezweho ndarakara vuba cyane kandi nkavuga nabi abandi
output: Umujinya ni uburyo umubiri ugusohoreza stress ya PTSD. Mbere yo kurakara, vuga “ngiye kwiherera gato” ugende ahandi, ufate umwuka 10, cyangwa ukande igitambaro. Nyuma wigaragarize uti “Mbabarira, umutima wanjye urababara”. Umujyanama ashobora kugufasha kugenzura umujinya.

scenario: PTSD – Physical symptoms (headaches, stomach aches) when triggered
instruction: Igihe nibuka ibyabaye umutwe cyangwa inda birantera ububabare bikomeye
output: Umubiri wawe wibuka ububabare wanyuzemo – ni byo bisanzwe muri PTSD. Igihe ubibona, icara hasi, fata amazi, ufate umwuka buhoro, cyangwa ukande ibintu byoroheje (nk’urushinge). Niba bikomeza, jya ku kigo nderabuzima – hari imiti ituma biruhuka.

scenario: PTSD – Anniversary reactions around genocide commemoration week
instruction: Mu kwa Kane ndababara cyane kandi sinshobora kuryama
output: Abenshi banyuzemo iby’1994 bumva ububabare bwinshi muri uku kwezi – bitwa anniversary reaction. Ni byiza gusenga hamwe n’abandi, kwibuka neza abacu, no kuganira n’umujyanama. Umubabare uragenda, kandi urakomeye kurusha ibyabaye.

scenario: PTSD – Difficulty concentrating in school after trauma
instruction: Mu ishuri ibyo niga biransohoka vuba kandi sinshobora kwibanda
output: PTSD ishobora guhindura imitekerereze. Bwira umwarimu utuje ko uhura n’ikibazo – bashobora kuguha umwanya wo kuruhuka. Soma gake gake, wicara imbere mu cyumba, kandi wige ufata impapuro. Igihe kiragenda uzakongera kwibanda neza.

scenario: PTSD – Feeling guilty for surviving when others didn’t
instruction: Abandi bapfuye ariko njyewe ndi muzima – nishinja cyane
output: Ibyo bitwa ‘survivor guilt’ kandi ni byo bisanzwe cyane. Ntabwo wari ufite ubushobozi bwo kubakingira. Abitavye bashaka ko wongera kwishima no kubaho neza. Jya wibuka ko ubuzima bwawe bufite agaciro kandi ugomba kubuharanira.

scenario: PTSD – Startling easily at loud noises
instruction: Ingo zivuga cyane cyangwa umuntu avuga hejuru nkuramo nijimye
output: Umubiri wawe urahora uri maso kubera PTSD. Igihe ubibona, vuga uti “Ndi umutekano, ni umugozi gusa”. Fata umwuka buhoro kugeza umutima uruhuka. Igihe kiragenda uzakomeza gutuza buhoro buhoro.

scenario: PTSD – Loss of interest in activities she used to love
instruction: Nataye ibyishimo byose – nta kindi nshaka gukina cyangwa kuririmba
output: Ni kimwe mu bimenyetso bikomeye bya PTSD. Ntugomba kwiyahura. Tangira ukore ikintu kimwe gito cyakunzwe mbere (nka gushushanya cyangwa kuririmba indirimbo imwe). Gake gake ibyishimo bizagaruka. Ganira n’umujyanama – baragufasha cyane.

scenario: PTSD – Feeling like the world is completely unsafe
instruction: None sinizera umuntu na rimwe – isi irankomeretsa
output: Nyuma y’ibyagezweho umutima wibwira ko byose bishobora kongera kuba bibi. Tangira wibuke abantu beza bari hafi yawe buri munsi (umwarimu, nyirasenge, incuti…). Gake gake uzakongera kwizera isi no kuyishimira.

scenario: PTSD – Self-harm thoughts after trauma
instruction: Rimwe nshaka kwikubita cyangwa kwiyica kugira ngo umubabare wo mu mutima uhagarare
output: Vuga ako kanya n’umuntu ukunda cyane cyangwa telefone Inshuti z’Ubuzima (0788353512) cyangwa ujye vuba ku kigo nderabuzima. Ntabwo uri wenyine kandi hari ubufasha. Umubiri wawe n’umutima wawe bakwiye gukira no gukundwa, ntibikwiye kwangizwa.

scenario: PTSD – Body memories (physical pain in the exact places she was hurt)
instruction: Rimwe umubiri wanjye ubabara aho yankomeretsa nta mpamvu
output: Bitwa ‘body memories’ – umubiri wibuka ibyabaye. Igihe ubibona, vuga uti “Ibyabaye byarashize, none ndi umutekano”. Oga amazi ashyushye cyangwa ufate massage ituje. Umujyanama ashobora kugufasha umubiri kwibagirwa ububabare.

scenario: PTSD – Re-enacting the trauma in play or drawings
instruction: Igihe nkinnye cyangwa nshushanya njya nshushanya ibyabaye gusa
output: Ni ukuntu umutwe ugerageza kwakira no gusohora iby’imbere. Ni byiza – ariko nyuma shushanya cyangwa ukine ibyishimo. Bwira umukuru ushushanya ibyo ushaka ko abona – bazagufasha gukira neza.

scenario: PTSD – Trust issues with all men after assault by a man
instruction: None ntinya abahungu n’abagabo bose – sinshobora no kuba hafi yabo
output: Ni byo bisanzwe nyuma y’uko umugabo yankomeretse. Ntibose babi – hari abahungu beza cyane (nk’abavandimwe, abashumba, abaganga). Tangira wizere gake gake abo uzi neza. Igihe kiragenda uzakongera kwizera abagabo beza.

scenario: PTSD – Hope for recovery
instruction: None se PTSD irakira burundu cyangwa nzahora ntyo?
output: Yego, PTSD irakira burundu ku bantu benshi iyo bafashwa vuba! Abavuzi b’imitima n’abajyanama bakoresha uburyo butuma umutwe wibagirwa ubwoba. Abakobwa n’abahungu benshi bakize kandi none barishima. Nawe uzakira – wizera kandi utange igihe.

scenario: PTSD – Finding a safe adult to talk to in the village
instruction: Nshaka kuganira ariko ntinya – ni nde nshobora kwizera mu mudugudu?
output: Shaka umwarimu w’umukobwa ukunda, umushumba, umujyanama w’umudugudu, umukozi w’ubuzima cyangwa nyirasenge ukunda. Umuti wa mbere wa PTSD ni kuganira n’umuntu umwizera. Ntuzahora wenyine – hari abantu benshi bashaka kugufasha.

scenario: PTSD – Using grounding box for panic moments
instruction: Nigute nshobora kwihagarika iyo ubwoba bwinshi buntera?
output: Kora ‘agakiriro k’umutekano’: shyiramo ibintu bituma wumva neza (foto y’umubyeyi, ikariso, ibitoki, urupapuro rw’amasengesho, inyuguti nziza). Igihe ubwoba buje, fungura agakiriro, nunamira, reba, umve – bigufasha kugaruka “hano none”. Ni imiti y’agateganyo kandi ikora cyane.

scenario: Complex PTSD – Feeling worthless because abuse happened many times over years
instruction: Kubera ibyabaye inshuro nyinshi ndibwira ko ntabwo nshobora kugirwa urukundo cyangwa ndi umwanda
output: Ibyabaye inshuro nyinshi byakomeretsa umutima cyane (bitwa Complex PTSD), ariko ntabwo byahindura agaciro kawe. Wowe uri umukobwa w’agaciro gakomeye cyane kandi ukunda kandi ukundwa n’Imana n’abantu beza. Buri munsi vuga wenyine imbere y’ikibona uti “Ndi umunyagaciro, ndi umukundwa, ibyabaye ntibyampaye agaciro”. Umujyanama w’imitima (mu bitaro bya Ndera cyangwa mu bigo by’incike) baragufasha kwiyakira burundu – abakobwa benshi bakize bakaba barishima.

scenario: Complex PTSD – Extreme emotional swings (from numb to crying to angry in minutes)
instruction: Umwijima rirahinduka vuba: rimwe ndi nta cyo numva, rimwe ndarira, rimwe ndarakara – nigute mbye?
output: Ni kimwe mu bimenyetso bikomeye bya Complex PTSD. Umubiri wawe utarasobanukirwa n’umutekano nyuma y’imyaka myinshi y’ubwoba. Kora “agakiriro k’imitima”: shyiramo ibintu bitatu – ikintu gituma wikinisha (ikibati), ikintu gituma wiruhusha (icyayi cy’umutobe), ikintu gituma wishima (foto cyangwa indirimbo). Igihe uhinduka, koresha kimwe muri byo. Nyuma wige guhagarara gato mbere yo kuvuga cyangwa gukora ikintu.

scenario: Complex PTSD – Chronic shame and self-hatred from long-term abuse
instruction: Njye niyanga kandi ninkeka ko abandi bose baransuzugura
output: Isoni n’ubwiyahuzi ni iby’ibinyoma wabwirwa inshuro nyinshi. Tangira “urupapuro rw’ukuri”: buri munsi wandike ibintu 3 byiza uri (n’ibito cyane: “Ndi umunyembabazi”, “Ndi umunyakuri”, “Ndi umunyampinga”). Soma rumwe na rumwe wenyine imbere y’ikibona. Umujyanama ashobora kugufasha kwandika “ibaruwa y’imbabazi” ku mwana wawe w’imbere – bigufasha gukira isoni burundu.

scenario: Complex PTSD – Difficulty trusting anyone after betrayal by family members
instruction: Ababyeyi cyangwa abavandimwe bandeshyeye – none sinshobora kwizera umuntu na rimwe
output: Kwizerana byangirika iyo abagombaga kukurinda bakagukomeretsa. Tangira “kwizera gake gake”: wizera umuntu umwe gusa ku kintu kimwe gito (nk’kumubwira ko wababaye umutwe). Igihe akwitwara neza, ongera ikintu gito. Nk’igiti gito, kwizera kuzura buhoro buhoro. Umujyanama ashobora kugufasha kwiga “imizere y’umutekano”.

scenario: Complex PTSD – Inner critic that repeats abuser’s words
instruction: Mu mutwe haravuga ijwi rirannyegeka nk’uko uwo yankomeretsaga yambwaga
output: Irya jwi si ryawe – ni irya we wabikoze. Tangira “kurwanya ijwi”: iyo rivuga uti “Uri umwanda”, subiza wenyine uti “Oya! Ndi umukobwa w’agaciro, ibyo wanyivugiye ni ibinyoma”. Wandike ibyo jwi rivuga hanyuma wirwanyeho. Umujyanama ashobora kugufasha guhindura iryo jwi rijye ryawe ry’urukundo.

scenario: Complex PTSD – Dissociation (feeling outside the body, time loss)
instruction: Rimwe numva nk’aho ndi hanze y’umubiri wanjye cyangwa igihe kirashira ntabwo nkibuka
output: Bitwa dissociation – ni ukuntu umutwe “wahagarara” iyo ubwoba bwinshi buje. Igihe ubibona, kanda ibirenge byawe hasi, nunamira ikintu gikaze, vuga izina ryawe n’imyaka yawe. Koresha “5-4-3-2-1” (reba ibintu 5, korako 4, umva 3, nunamira 2, nywa 1). Ni byiza kuganira n’umujyanama kuko Complex PTSD ishobora gukira neza iyo ufashwa.

scenario: Complex PTSD – Re-enacting abusive relationships as an adult pattern
instruction: Ndamukunda umuhungu ariko arantuka nk’uko data yambwaga – nigute mbye?
output: Complex PTSD ishobora gutuma umutwe “wibwira ko urukundo rugomba kubabaza”. Ni byiza kwihagarika ako kanya no kubwira umuntu ukomeye (umujyanama, umushumba, umubyeyi). Wakwigishwa kwizera no gukunda neza. Uri w’agaciro kandi ukwiye urukundo rw’ukuri – ntuzemere umuntu kugukomeretsa.

scenario: Complex PTSD – Chronic body pain with no medical cause
instruction: Umubiri wanjye urababara iteka kandi abaganga ntibabona indwara
output: Complex PTSD ishobora gutuma umubiri “wibuke” ububabare wanyuzemo imyaka myinshi. Oga amazi ashyushye, kina byoroshye, wige gufata umwuka w’inda (belly breathing). Umujyanama ashobora kugufasha “kwigisha umubiri umutekano” – bigabanya ububabare cyane.

scenario: Complex PTSD – Fear of abandonment leading to clinging behavior
instruction: Ntinya ko incuti cyangwa umukunzi azansiga – njya mpora nshaka kuba kumwe na bo iteka
output: Ni ukuntu umwana wawe w’imbere wumva ko “niba nsize bazongera kunkomeretsa”. Vuga wenyine uti “None ndi mukuru, ndi umutekano, abakunda barahari”. Bwira incuti neza uti “Ntinya kuba wenyine, mfasha kumva nteye neza”. Umujyanama ashobora kugufasha kwiyakira no kwizera ko utazongera gusigwa.

scenario: Complex PTSD – Building a “safe place” visualization
instruction: Nigute nshobora kwibwira ko ndi umutekano mu mutwe wanjye?
output: Funga amaso, wibuke aho wumva neza cyane (mu itorero, ku gasozi, mu nzu ya nyirabukwe…). Reba ibara, umva amajwi, nunamira ibyatsi cyangwa amababi. Vuga uti “Hano ndi umutekano, ntawe unyica”. Jya ujyayo mu mutwe igihe ubwoba buje – ni inzu yawe y’imbere idashobora guhonyorwa.

scenario: Complex PTSD – Self-soothing like a loving parent
instruction: Nshaka kwiyoroherereza ariko sinazi uko
output: Kanda ibitsina byawe cyangwa kanda umutwe wenyine buhoro buhoro ukinisha uti “Uri umukobwa mwiza, ndagukunda, ndi hafi yawe, ndagukingiye”. Ni uko wowe waba nyina w’umwana wawe w’imbere. Buri joni kora icyo kimwe – igihe kirambye uzakwiyumva nk’umukundwa.

scenario: Complex PTSD – Grieving the childhood that was stolen
instruction: Nababara kubera ubwana bwanjye bwarangiranye n’ubukomeretswe
output: Ni byiza kurira ubwana bwaribwe. Wandika ibaruwa ku mwana wawe w’imbere uti “Mbabarira ko sinagukingiye, none ndagukunda kandi tuzarishya hamwe”. Senga, uteke agatambaro ko kumwibuka, cyangwa uteke ibitoki ukabigaburira abana bato. Ni ukuriha icyubahiro ubwana bwawe kandi ukabona ko uzakira.

scenario: Complex PTSD – Long-term recovery hope
instruction: None se Complex PTSD irakira burundu?
output: Yego! Abakobwa n’abagore benshi bakize Complex PTSD bakabona ubuzima bushya bw’ibyishimo n’amahoro. Bigira igihe (imyaka 1–5 iyo ufashwa neza), ariko birakira burundu. Uzabona kwishima, kwizera, gukunda no gukundwa. Uri ku nzira y’ubugingo bushya – komeza, uri umukomeye!

scenario: Self-harm prevention – First time urge after trauma
instruction: Nshaka kwikubita cyangwa kwigereka kugira ngo umubabare wo mu mutima uhagarare
output: Umubabare wo mu mutima urakomeye cyane, ariko umubiri wawe ntugomba kuwuvuna. Vuba ako kanya telefone Inshuti z’Ubuzima 0788353512 cyangwa 114 (ni ubuntu), cyangwa vuga n’umubyeyi, umwarimu cyangwa umukozi w’ubuzima. Hari ubufasha bw’ako kanya kandi ntuba wenyine. Umubiri wawe ni wawe w’agaciro – ugomba gukira, ntugomba kwangizwa.

scenario: Self-harm prevention – Delay technique
instruction: Nshaka kwiyica none ako kanya – nigute nihagarika?
output: Iyemeze uti “Ngiye gutegereza iminota 10 gusa”. Fata icyuma cyangwa ikaramu ifite inkono y’umuhondo, shushanya imirongo ku rupapuro cyangwa ku kuboko n’inkono gusa (ntigakomeretsa). Nywa icyayi gitonoye cyangwa amazi y’icyumba, cyangwa jya mu bwiherero ukande igitambaro cyangwa pillow bikomeye. Imbese iminota 10 ishira – rimwe urashobora gutegereza indi 10. Igihe kirambye urabona ko ubishobora.

scenario: Self-harm prevention – Ice cube method
instruction: Nshaka kwiyica ariko sinshaka gutangaza umubiri wanjye
output: Shyira amazi mu gikombe ugafata cube y’urubura (ice). Fata cube mu kuboko cyangwa uyishyire ku kandi kuboko, ku gituza cyangwa mu nda – birababaza ariko ntibikomeretsa. Igihe urubura rushira, umubabare wo mu mutima na wo uragabanuka. Ni uburyo bworoshye kandi bufasha cyane.

scenario: Self-harm prevention – Red pen technique
instruction: Nshaka kwigereka ariko ntinya ko ababyeyi bazabibona
output: Fata ikaramu y’umuhondo cyangwa marker y’umuhondo, shushanya imirongo aho wari ushaka kwigereka. Nyuma wige kuyisiba n’amazi gusa. Bigufasha kumva ububabare buto ariko nta nkomere. Wandike ku rupapuro uti “Ndi umukobwa w’agaciro, ndakunda umubiri wanjye”.

scenario: Self-harm prevention – Rubber band snap
instruction: Mfite elastic band mu ntoki – nigute nyikoresha?
output: Shyira elastic band mu ntoki. Igihe ushaka kwiyica, nyeganyura elastic band ku ntoki cyangwa ku gituza gato – birababaza ariko ntibikomeretsa. Bigufasha kumva ububabare buto kandi byihuse, nyuma umutima uruhuka. Vuga wenyine uti “Ndakomeza, ndi umukomeye”.

scenario: Self-harm prevention – 15-minute rule
instruction: Nshaka kwiyica cyane – nigute nca muri ibyo?
output: Iyemeze “Nzategereza iminota 15 gusa”. Buri munota 5 kora ikintu kimwe: kunywa amazi, gufata umwuka buhoro, kwandika ibyo wumva, kuririmba, gusenga, cyangwa koga amaso ukabara ibara. Imbese iminota 15 ishira – rimwe ushobora gutegereza indi 15. Abenshi barabona ko bashobora kurenga umunsi utagezeho.

scenario: Self-harm prevention – Safe box with alternatives
instruction: Nigute nshobora kubika ibintu byanjye byo kwiyica?
output: Kora “agakiriro k’umutekano”: teka agasanduku gato ushyiremo ice cubes, elastic band, ikaramu y’umuhondo, urupapuro n’inkono, foto y’umuntu ukunda, n’ibaruwa wanditse uti “Ndakunda umubiri wanjye”. Igihe ushaka kwiyica, fungura agasanduku ukoreshe kimwe muri byo. Nyuma wandike icyo cyagufashije kuri telefoni cyangwa mu gitabo.

scenario: Self-harm prevention – Calling a trusted person
instruction: Nshaka kwiyica kandi ntabwo nshobora kwihagarika
output: Vuga ako kanya! Telefone umubyeyi, nyirasenge, umwarimu, incuti, cyangwa Inshuti z’Ubuzima 0788353512 (24/24). Vuga uti “Mfite ikibazo, nshaka kwiyica – mfasha”. Ntibazakwibaza nabi – bazagufasha kandi bakwereka urukundo. Kwihisha birongera umubabare – kuvuga biragabanya.

scenario: Self-harm prevention – Butterfly project
instruction: Nshaka kwigereka ariko sinshaka inkovu
output: Fata marker cyangwa peni, shushanya igipapati (butterfly) ku kuboko aho wari ushaka kwigereka. Andike izina ry’umuntu ukunda cyangwa izina ryawe. Iyemeze uti “Igihe igipapati kizima nta nkomere – nigipapati kirarama, nanjye ndarama”. Iyo igipapati kigize, wishimire ko watsinze umunsi.

scenario: Self-harm prevention – Intense physical activity
instruction: Nshaka kwiyica kandi umubiri wanjye urakaze
output: Koresha imbaraga zo mu mubiri neza: kuruka vuba, gukinisha, gukina umupira, cyangwa gukanda pillow cyangwa igitanda. Nywa amazi, jya mu kirere. Igihe umubiri uruhutse, umutima na wo uruhuka. Vuga uti “Ndi umukomeye, ndi umunyembabazi”.

scenario: Self-harm prevention – Writing a letter to the urge
instruction: Nshaka kwiyica – nigute mvuga n’ibyo numva?
output: Fata urupapuro wandike uti “Wa mubabare wo mu mutima, ndakumenya kandi ndakwumva. Ariko kwiyica ntibikurwanya – birongera umubabare. Ndakwiyemeje kuzagufasha mu bundi buryo”. Nyuma utwike urupapuro cyangwa urusibye. Bigufasha kumva ko wumva kandi ufite ubushobozi.

scenario: Self-harm prevention – Long-term replacement plan
instruction: Niyica buri gihe nshaka guhagarika burundu
output: Buri gihe watsinze umunsi utiyise, wishimishe: andika ⭐ ku kalendari, wambare urukoba rwiza, cyangwa wige ikintu gishya. Wandike ibyagufashije kugira ngo ubikoreshe indi ntambara. Ganira n’umujyanama w’imitima vuba – baragufasha gukira burundu kandi uzabona amahoro yo mu mutima.

scenario: Self-harm prevention – When scars are visible and people ask
instruction: Abantu bareba inkovu bandabaza – nigute mbwira?
output: Ushobora kuvuga uti “Nanyuzemo ibibazo ariko none ndi ku nzira yo gukira” cyangwa “Ni iby’igihe gishize, none ndi umukomeye”. Nta ntwari yo gusobanura byose. Jya wambara ibyo wishimira kandi wibuke ko inkovu zigaragaza imbaraga zawe, ntizigaragaza agaciro kawe.

scenario: Self-harm prevention – Prayer and faith-based coping
instruction: Nshaka kwiyica ariko ndi Umunyakristu – nigute?
output: Senga uti “Nyagasani, mpa imbaraga zo kurenga iyi ntambara. Ndi umwana wawe kandi ndakunda umubiri wawe wampaye”. Soma Zaburi 23, 34 cyangwa 91. Fata rosari cyangwa ufate ikariso mu kuboko. Imana iragukunda kandi iragufasha – ntuzahora urwana wenyine.

scenario: Self-harm prevention – Emergency plan for home
instruction: Mu rugo hari ibintu nshobora kwikoresha – nigute?
output: Bwira umubyeyi cyangwa umuvandimwe mukuru uti “Mfite ikibazo, mfasha kubika ibintu by’inkorano cyangwa ibikomeretsa”. Mu cyumba cyayo ushyire agasanduku k’umutekano (ice, marker, ibitabo by’Imana, foto…). Buri joro mbere yo kuryama, vuga wenyine uti “None ndi umutekano, ndaruhuka, ndi umukundwa”.

scenario: Eating disorder prevention – Girl starting to skip meals because she thinks she is too fat
instruction: Ndi nini cyane kandi ntinya kurya – nigute mbye?
output: Umubiri wawe ukiri kugira imbaraga zo gukura no kwiga. Kurya gake biratuma utera indwara, umutwe urababara kandi ugira ubwoba bwinshi. Buri mukobwa afite umubiri we bwite kandi wose ari mwiza. Jya urya ibyokurya byiza 3 ku munsi (ibijumba, ibitoki, amateke, amafi, imboga…) kandi unywe amazi ahagije. Niba ugira ubwoba bwinshi bwo kurya, bwira nyoko, umwarimu cyangwa umukozi w’ubuzima – ntuba wenyine kandi baragufasha kwiyakira neza.

scenario: Eating disorder prevention – Fear of gaining weight after someone called her fat
instruction: Bamvuze ko ndi nini kandi none sinshaka kongera kunanuka
output: Amagambo y’abandi arakomeretsa ariko ntabwo akuranga. Abakobwa benshi barananuka mu bukure kandi ni byiza kuko umubiri urimo kwera amaboko n’ibirenge. Ibyo kurya biragufasha kugira imbaraga zo kwiga no gukina. Jya wibuka ibyiza 3 umubiri wawe ukora buri munsi (uragenda, urasoma, urira…). Niba ugira isoni, bwira umuntu ukunda – bazagufasha kwiyakira neza.

scenario: Eating disorder prevention – Only eating “safe” foods and panicking about others
instruction: Narya ibitoki n’amagi gusa kuko ibindi birantuma nini
output: Umubiri wawe akeneye ibyokurya byose (proteyine, vitamini, amavuta meza) kugira ngo ukomeze kwiga no kugira umutima mwiza. Kurya ibintu bimwe gusa biratuma urwara kandi umutwe urushaho kugira ubwoba. Tangira wongera ikintu kimwe gishya ku munsi (umuceri, imboga, amate…). Jya wiyemeza uti “Ndi umukomeye, umubiri wanjye urakunda ibyokurya byiza”. Bwira nyoko akagufasha gutegura ifunguro ryiza.

scenario: Eating disorder prevention – Vomiting after eating (early bulimia signs)
instruction: Narya nyuma nkajya mu bwiherero nkuramo kugira ngo sinanuke
output: Ibyo birakomeretsa umubiri kandi biratuma umutima, amenyo n’inda birwara. Vuba bwira umubyeyi, umwarimu cyangwa umukozi w’ubuzima uti “Mfite ikibazo n’ukurya, mfasha”. Ntuba wenyine – abakobwa benshi banyuzemo barakize iyo bavuga vuba. Umubiri wawe ugomba gukomeza ibyo uryanye – ni wo mutungo wawe w’agaciro.

scenario: Eating disorder prevention – Counting every calorie and exercising too much
instruction: Ntega kalori zose kandi nkinisha iminota 90 buri munsi
output: Kumenya ibyo uryanye ni byiza, ariko iyo byaba byinshi biratuma umubiri urananirwa. Umukobwa ukiri muto akeneye ibyokurya byinshi kurusha umukuru. Kurya neza no gukina 30–60 min buri munsi ni byo byiza. Reka gutega kalori kandi wiyemeze kurya ifunguro 3 n’ibinyamisogwe 2 ku munsi. Niba biragoye, ganira n’umukozi w’ubuzima.

scenario: Eating disorder prevention – Family meals strategy
instruction: Sinshaka kurya imbere y’abandi kubera isoni
output: Kurya hamwe n’umuryango ni kimwe mu byiza kurusha byose ku mutima n’umubiri. Tangira ufungura gake gake (n’ikijumba kimwe) imbere y’umuntu umwe ukunda. Jya wibuka ko ababyeyi n’abavandimwe bakunda kuguha ibyokurya – ni urukundo. Igihe kiragenda uzakenera kurya hamwe utishye.

scenario: Eating disorder prevention – Body checking (measuring waist every day)
instruction: Buri munsi ntega umukorogoto wanjye n’ikibero kugira ngo ntegereze niba nanutse
output: Umubiri wa mukobwa uhinduka buri munsi bitewe n’amazi, imihango n’ibindi. Gutega buri munsi biragufitiye ubwoba bwinshi. Iyemeze uti “Nzitegera rimwe gusa ku kwezi”. Bika ikibero cyangwa umupapuro wo gutega kure. Jya wambara impuzu zishimishije kandi wiyakire neza nk’uko uri.

scenario: Eating disorder prevention – Positive food affirmations
instruction: Igihe ntegereje ifunguro ndatinya cyane
output: Mbere yo kurya, vuga uti “Ibyokurya ni imiti y’umubiri n’umutima wanjye. Ndi umukobwa w’agaciro kandi umubiri wanjye ukunda ibyo nmuha”. Nywa amazi mbere, urya buhoro, wibuke ko buri kumwa ari urukundo uri wiyitaye. Nyuma wiyemeze uti “Nashimye, ndi umukomeye”.

scenario: Eating disorder prevention – When friends talk about dieting
instruction: Incuti zanjye ziravuga ko zigomba kugabanya ibiro – none nanjye ngomba?
output: Mu bukure umubiri wawe urimo gukenera ibyokurya byinshi kurusha mbere. Abenshi mu bakobwa barananuka kandi ni byiza. Niba uri muzima kandi ufite imbaraga, nta mpamvu yo kugabanya. Jya wibuka ko incuti z’ukuri zigukunda nk’uko uri, ntabwo zigutega ibiro.

scenario: Eating disorder prevention – Faith-based eating
instruction: Ndi Umunyakristu kandi ntinya kurya byinshi
output: Imana yaguhaye umubiri nk’ishengero – ugomba kuwita neza. Mu Gitabo hagira hati “Kurya cyangwa kunywa, bikorere Imana” (1 Kor 10:31). Fungura maze usenge uti “Mbabarira Imana ko ntinya imigisha yawe. Mpa imbaraga zo kwakira ibyo wampaye”. Kurya ni isengesho ry’urukundo.

scenario: Eating disorder prevention – Hunger-fullness scale for rural girls
instruction: Sinzi igihe nkeneye kurya cyangwa nigihe nshobora guhagarara
output: Tekereza urwego rwa 1–10: 1 = inda iri ibusa cyane, 10 = iruhije cyane. Tangira urya iyo uri kuri 3–4 (inda itangiye kugaya), uhagarara kuri 6–7 (ushimye ariko utaruhije). Jya wibaza “Inda yanjye iri hehe?” mbere no nyuma yo kurya. Igihe kiragenda uzakenera kumva umubiri wawe neza.

scenario: Eating disorder prevention – When menstruation stops from not eating enough
instruction: Imihango yarahagaritse kandi sinzi impamvu
output: Rimwe na rimwe iyo umukobwa aarya make cyane cyangwa akinisha cyane, imihango irahagarara – ni ikimenyetso ko umubiri utagira amavuta ahagije. Ni ngombwa kurya neza kugira ngo imihango igaruke kandi umubiri ugume muzima. Bwira nyoko cyangwa ujye ku kigo nderabuzima – bazagufasha kongera kurya neza.

scenario: Eating disorder prevention – Long-term recovery message
instruction: Nababara n’ukurya kandi nshaka gukira burundu
output: Yego, abakobwa benshi bakize indwara z’ukurya kandi none barishima cyane! Ganira vuba n’umujyanama w’imitima cyangwa umukozi w’ubuzima. Uzongera kurya neza, kwishima no kwiyakira umubiri wawe. Uri umukobwa w’agaciro kandi utazahora urira – ejo hazaza heza cyane!

scenario: A young girl asking about her first period, what to expect, and how to manage it
instruction: Ni iki igihe cyanjye cy'ukwezi cya mbere, ni iki nkwiye kumenya no gukora?
output: Igihe cy'ukwezi (imihango) ni amaraso asohoka mu gitsina cy'umukobwa buri kwezi, ni ibisanzwe kandi ntibivuze ko urwaye. Ushobora kumva ufite ububabare mu nda cyangwa mu mugongo, ariko iyo bibabaza cyane ushobora kubwira umubyeyi, umwarimu cyangwa umukozi w'ubuzima. Koresha udutambaro tw'isuku cyangwa pads zisukuye, uzihindure buri saha 4–6 kugira ngo utandura. Jya wikaraba neza n'amazi meza n'isabune, unafate umwanya wo kuruhuka no kunywa amazi ahagije. Niba amaraso arenze ibisanzwe cyangwa ukagira ububabare bwinshi, vuga n'umuganga.

scenario: A young girl asking about her first period, what to expect, and how to manage it
instruction: Imihango igiye kundya bwa mbere. Ni iki nkwiriye gutegereza? Ndabigenza nte?
output: Igihe cy'imihango ya mbere gishobora kuza uhereye ku myaka 9 kugeza 15. Imenyetso ni ukubona amaraso mu gitsina, bishobora gutangira ari make cyangwa menshi. Ni byiza kumenya aho udutambaro tw'isuku turi mbere y'uko ubibona, kandi ukamenya ko ububabare buke mu nda ari ibisanzwe. Gabanya isukari, unywe amazi menshi, kandi wumve ko nta kibazo kiriho, ni igice gisanzwe cy'ubuzima bwawe.

scenario: A young girl asking about her first period, what to expect, and how to manage it
instruction: Imihango izangora, se ntabwo nzajya mu ishuri? Ni gute ntegura umubiri wanjye?
output: Oya, imihango ntigomba kugutera kureka kujya ku ishuri. Tegura utubuye tw'isuku (pads) buri gihe, kandi ujye ugerageza kwihindura mu gihe cyagenwe (burihahora 4-6). Kugira ngo ugabanye uburibwe, ushobora gushyira ikintu gishyushye ku nda, ukora siporo yoroheje (genda), kandi ukarya indyo yuzuye. Ibi bizagufasha kumva umeze neza no gukomeza ibikorwa byawe bya buri munsi.

scenario: A young girl asking about how her body changes during puberty
instruction: Ndashaka kumenya uburyo umubiri wanjye uzahinduka mu gihe cyo gukura. Ni ibihe bimenyetso bizaza?
output: Igihe cyo gukura ni igihe gitangira ku myaka 8 kugeza 14. Uzatangira gukura amabere, umusatsi (ubwoya) utangire kumera munsi y'ibiganza (kwaha) no ku gitsina. Uzatera igihagararo, kandi umubiri wawe uzajya ugira icyuya cyinshi. Ni ibintu bisanzwe kandi bibaho kuri buri mukobwa, bikwereka ko umubiri wawe ukura neza.

scenario: A young girl asking about how her body changes during puberty
instruction: Ni gute igice cyanjye cy'igitsina gihinduka mu gihe cyo gukura? Ni iki kiba kuri nyababyeyi?
output: Mu gihe cyo gukura, nyababyeyi iba yitegura gushobora gusama. Imyanya y'ibanga irakura gato, kandi uzatangira kubona imihango (menstruation). Ibi ni igimenyetso cyerekana ko umubiri wawe ushoboye gutwita, nubwo ari ngombwa kumenya ko kuba wajya mu mihango bidahita bivuze ko uri mukuru bihagije kubaka urugo.

scenario: A young girl asking about how her body changes during puberty
instruction: Ese ni ngombwa ko gukura kw'umukobwa wese gutangira mu myaka imwe? Niba ntangiriye gukura mbere y'abandi, ni ikibazo?
output: Oya, umukobwa wese agira igihe cye cyo gutangira gukura. Hari abatangira kare (ku myaka 8), abandi bagatangira batinze (ku myaka 14). Ibi ni ibisanzwe. Niba ubona uri gukura vuba cyangwa bitinze cyane ugereranyije n'abandi, kandi bikaguhangayikisha, ushobora kubaza umubyeyi cyangwa muganga. Nta mpamvu yo kwigereranya n'abandi.

scenario: A young girl confused about physical changes happening to her body
instruction: Amabere yanjye atangiye gukura ariko ashobora kumbabaza, kandi umwe uruta undi. Ni ibiki bimbayeho?
output: Igihe amabere atangira gukura ni ibisanzwe ko ashobora kubabaza gato. Ni ibimenyetso byiza byerekana ko umubiri wawe uri gukura. Kandi ni ibisanzwe rwose ko amabere ataba angana neza mu ntangiriro cyangwa no nyuma. Mu gihe cyose ubona ububabare burashira, nta mpamvu yo guhangayika.

scenario: A young girl confused about physical changes happening to her body
instruction: Ndi kubona imisemburo (ibishishyi) ku ruhu rw'amaso no mu maso. Ese ni iki bivuze? Hari icyo nkwiye gukora?
output: Kugira imisemburo mu maso (acne) ni ibisanzwe mu gihe cyo gukura, biterwa n'imisemburo ihinduka mu mubiri. Jya ukaraba mu maso n'isabune n'amazi meza inshuro ebyiri ku munsi, ntukore kuri ibyo bishishyi kugira ngo bitakwandura. Niba birenze urugero, ushobora kubwira umubyeyi akajya kugisha inama kwa muganga w'uruhu.

scenario: A young girl confused about physical changes happening to her body
instruction: Ndi kubona ubwoya ku gitsina no munsi y'amaboko (kwaha). Ese ibi ni byiza? Ndabigenza nte?
output: Ubwiza bw'imisatsi ku gitsina no munsi y'amaboko ni ibimenyetso bisanzwe byo gukura. Ni wowe wihitiramo niba ushaka kubugumana cyangwa kubukuraho. Niba ushaka kubukuraho, bishobora gukoresha udukoresho twagenewe kubwaho, kandi ugomba kwitonda kugira ngo wirinde kwikomeretsa cyangwa kwanduza uruhu. Mu gihe wamaze kubwaho, ni ngombwa kwiyogosha ugakoresha isabune yoroheje.

scenario: A young girl asking about proper hygiene practices during her period
instruction: Ni gute nakwirinda guhumura nabi mu gihe ndi mu mihango? Ni incuro zingahe nkwiriye guhindura 'pad'?
output: Kugira isuku ni ngombwa cyane mu gihe cy'imihango. Ugomba guhindura 'pad' buri masaha 4-6, kabone niyo amaraso yaba ari make, kugira ngo wirinde umwanda n'impumuro mbi. Jya wiyogesha buri munsi, cyangwa ugakaraba igice cy'ibanga buri gihe uhinduye 'pad' ukoresheje amazi meza n'isabune. Wumva utuje kandi ubona umeze neza.

scenario: A young girl asking about proper hygiene practices during her period
instruction: Nigeze kubona amaraso ashushye atose ku ntebe yanjye. Ndabigenza nte ngo nibice?
output: Iyo amaraso agushusheho, hita ufata 'pad' nshya. Iyo ugiye mu bwiherero, karaba neza igice cy'ibanga ukoresheje amazi meza. Niba amaraso yanditse ku myenda, hita uyimesa n'amazi akonje mbere y'uko ukoresha isabune, kuko amazi ashyushye ashobora gutuma atava. Nta mpamvu yo kumva ubabajwe kuko bishobora kubaho kuri buri mukobwa wese.

scenario: A young girl asking about proper hygiene practices during her period
instruction: Ese ni byiza gukoresha amazi n'isabune mu gitsina cyanjye mu gihe cy'imihango? Hari ibyo ntangomba gukora?
output: Jya ukaraba igice cyo hanze cy'igitsina cyangwa ikibuno (vulva) ukoresheje amazi n'isabune yoroheje, ariko wirinde kuyikoresha mu gice cyo imbere (vagina) kuko bishobora kwanduza. Ni ngombwa kwikuraho uhereye imbere (mu gitsina) ukurikira inyuma (ku kibuno) kugira ngo wirinde gukura umwanda ku gitsina. Kandi wirinde gukoresha impumuro nziza cyangwa ibintu by'imisemburo ku gice cy'ibanga.

scenario: A young girl asking what consent means and how to recognize it
instruction: Ubwumvikane (Consent) ni iki? Ni gute nzi ko umuntu ansize ubwumvikane bwanjye?
output: Ubwumvikane ni ukwemeranya gukora ikintu runaka. Ni ngombwa ko ubwumvikane bukorwa ku buryo bwo 'Yego' cyangwa 'Oya' ku gice cy'umuntu. Ubwumvikane bugomba guhora buriho, bushobora guhinduka igihe icyo aricyo cyose. Nta bwumvikane buriho iyo umuntu ari muto cyane, yasinze, cyangwa arimo gukoreshwa imbaraga. Niba uvuga 'Oya', ntibivuze ko ubwumvikane bwahari.

scenario: A young girl asking what consent means and how to recognize it
instruction: Niba hari umuntu umfashe ku mubiri kandi ntanze ubwumvikane, nshobora kubuhindura?
output: Yego, ubwumvikane bugomba guhora buriho kandi bushobora kuvaho igihe cyose. Niba hari umuntu uvuga 'Yego' muri iki gihe, niba nyuma y'iminota mike avuga 'Oya', agomba kumva no kubaha icyemezo cyawe. Umubiri wawe ni uwawe, kandi wemerewe kubaha cyangwa kubukuraho ubwumvikane igihe icyo aricyo cyose.

scenario: A young girl asking what consent means and how to recognize it
instruction: Umuntu anteye ubwoba kugira ngo mvuge 'Yego'. Ese ubwo buba ari ubwumvikane bubaho?
output: Oya, iyo umuntu akoresheje imbaraga, gutera ubwoba, cyangwa se gutanga impano kugira ngo uvuge 'Yego', ubwo ntabwo buba ari ubwumvikane nyakuri. Ubwumvikane nyakuri bugomba kuva ku muntu ubwe nta gahato. Niba hari umuntu ugiye kugushyiraho igitutu kugira ngo akore ikintu runaka, ni byiza kubivuga ukitandukanya nabo.

scenario: A young girl asking about what makes a healthy relationship with peers
instruction: Ni iki gitandukanya inshuti nziza n'inshuti mbi? Ni gute nabaka umubano mwiza hagati y'inshuti zanjye?
output: Umubano mwiza ushingiye ku bwizerane, kubahana, gushyigikirana, no kuganira neza. Inshuti nziza ni uwumva ibitekerezo byawe, agukundira uko uri, kandi ntagutere gukora ibintu utishimiye. Kugira ngo uwubake, uba ugomba kubaha inshuti zawe, kuzivugisha ukuri, no kubashyigikira mu bibazo.

scenario: A young girl asking about what makes a healthy relationship with peers
instruction: Ni ibihe bimenyetso bigaragaza ko umuntu ari inshuti mbi cyangwa umukunzi mubi?
output: Inshuti mbi ishobora kuguha amagambo yica, kukugira impamvu yo kwigira hejuru, cyangwa kukubuza kuganira n'abandi. Umukunzi mubi ashobora kuguha ibiganiro bya buri munsi, kukubuza gufata ibyemezo, cyangwa kuguha uburibwe. Iyo ubona umuntu agushyiraho igitutu cyangwa ugira umutima uhora uhangayitse, vuga n'umuntu wizera.

scenario: A young girl asking about what makes a healthy relationship with peers
instruction: Ndi kureba ku mukunzi wanjye wa mbere. Ni gute nzi ko umubano wacu ari mwiza kandi utari bubangamire amasomo yanjye?
output: Umubano mwiza w'urukundo rwa mbere ugomba kuba ushingiye ku kubahana no kuganira neza. Mugomba kwizerana no kwiha umwanya wo gukora ibindi bikorwa (amasomo, inshuti). Niba umukunzi wawe aguha igitutu kugira ngo ureke amashuri, cyangwa ugira ubwoba mu gihe uri kumwe nawe, ni ikimenyetso kibi.

scenario: A young girl feeling pressured by friends to do something she's uncomfortable with
instruction: Inshuti zanjye ziransaba gukora ibintu ntifuza. Ni gute navuga 'Oya' ntibambwirire?
output: Ni ngombwa kumenya agaciro kawe. Vuga 'Oya' ku buryo buhamye kandi butuje. Niba batumva, ushobora kuvuga uti, 'Oya, si ikintu nifuza gukora.' cyangwa 'Ntabwo nshaka ibyo. Niba uri inshuti yanjye, uzumva icyemezo cyanjye.' Gerageza kwitandukanya nabo aho kugira ngo bakugire ikigirwamana. Inshuti nziza zizakubaha.

scenario: A young girl feeling pressured by friends to do something she's uncomfortable with
instruction: Inshuti zanjye zirambwira ko niba ntakoze ibi, ntawundi uzankunda. Ni iki nkwiriye gukora?
output: Ibyo bita 'igitutu cya bagenzi' kandi ntabwo ari byiza. Abakunda bose ntibazagutera gukora ibintu bibi. Abakunda uzatuzwa nabo, abandi bazagukunda. Ni ngombwa kwigirira icyizere no gukora ibikubereye. Abakugira impamvu yo kugira icyizere cyawe ni bo ukwiye kwirinda.

scenario: A young girl feeling pressured by friends to do something she's uncomfortable with
instruction: Ni ubuhe buryo bwiza bwo kwitandukanya n'inshuti mbi zishyiraho igitutu?

Wibande ku mikorere yawe, nka kumenya gusoma neza, kuba ufite ubumenyi, no kugira umutima mwiza. Jya wivugisha amagambo meza, kandi ntugereranye umubiri wawe n'uw'abandi.

instruction: Imihango yangu yatinze cyane. Ni kenshi kangahe ngomba kujya mu mihango?

instruction: Ni gute nakemura ibibazo mu nshuti zanjye nta mpamvu yo kurwana?

output: Kwiga gahunda kandi ufite umwanya wo kuruhuka byagufasha. Gabanya umwanya wo kwiga mu bice bito, kandi shaka umwanya wo gukora ibindi bikorwa (siporo, imyidagaduro). Vuga n'umwarimu cyangwa umubyeyi uburyo ufite ubwoba.

scenario: A young girl experiencing constant worry and fear about school or social situations
instruction: Ni gute nshobora gukora ikintu gikunda kugira ngo nigabanye guhangayika?
output: Gukora ikintu gikunda byagufasha cyane. Nko gusoma igitabo, gukora siporo, kumva umuziki, cyangwa kuganira n'inshuti. Shaka umwanya wo gukora ikintu kimwe mu masaha make buri munsi kugira ngo ugabanye guhangayika.

scenario: A young girl experiencing constant worry and fear about school or social situations
instruction: Ese gushyira amaboko mu mubiri (hug) bishobora kugabanya guhangayika?
output: Yego, gushyira amaboko mu mubiri bishobora kugabanya guhangayika. Iyo ukoranye n'umuntu ukunda, umubiri wawe ushobora gusohora imisemburo (hormones) yo kugabanya guhangayika. Niba ufite umuntu ukwizera, ushobora kumusaba gushyira amaboko mu mubiri.

scenario: A young girl experiencing constant worry and fear about school or social situations
instruction: Ndi kubona mfite ubwoba bwinshi bwo kugenda ku ishuri. Ni iki nkwiriye gukora?
output: Banza ugera ku ishuri hakiri kare cyangwa wirinde kugenda wenyine. Shaka umwanya wo kuruhuka mbere y'uko ugomba kugenda. Niba bikomeje, vuga n'umubyeyi cyangwa umwarimu uburyo ufite ubwoba.

scenario: A young girl experiencing constant worry and fear about school or social situations
instruction: Ese ni byiza kuvuga n'umuganga kuri kanga kandi nzi ko mfite ubwoba?
output: Yego, kuvuga n'umuganga byagufasha kumva umeze neza. Umuganga azagufasha kumenya uburyo bwiza bwo kwitwara. Ntugire impamvu yo gutinya, kuko buri muntu wese agira ibibazo bye.

scenario: A young girl experiencing constant worry and fear about school or social situations
instruction: Ni gute nshobora kwigabanya guhangayika ku byerekeye ejo hazaza?
output: Kwibanda ku gihe cya none ni ingamba nziza. Shaka ikintu ushobora gukora muri iki gihe (urugero: gusoma igitabo). Menya ko nta kigomba kuba neza, kandi uri gukora ibyiza byawe. Gutekereza cyane ku byerekeye ejo hazaza bishobora kukugora.

instruction: Ndi kubona mfite umutwe cyangwa uburibwe bw'umubiri buri munsi. Ni iki nkwiriye gukora?
output: Ububabare bw'umubiri bushobora kuba ikimenyetso cyo guhangayika. Gerageza kuruhuka, kunywa amazi, no gukora siporo yoroheje. Niba bikomeje, vuga n'umuganga kugira ngo ugishwe inama.

scenario: A young girl experiencing constant worry and fear about school or social situations
instruction: Ese ni byiza kwandika ibitekerezo byanjye? Ni gute byagufasha?
output: Yego, kwandika ibitekerezo byawe byagufasha kumva umeze neza. Kwandika bizagufasha kumenya ibintu bikugora, kandi bigatuma ugabanya guhangayika. Shaka umwanya wo kwandika buri munsi.

scenario: A young girl experiencing constant worry and fear about school or social situations
instruction: Ndi kubona ndatinda mu bintu byinshi byo gukora ku ishuri. Ni gute nakwigabanya uburibwe bw'akazi?
output: Gutangira n'akazi gake cyangwa koroshye byagufasha. Gabanya akazi kose kuva ku gice kimwe. Ni ngombwa kumenya ko nta kigomba kuba neza buri gihe. Shaka inshuti zishobora kugufasha, kandi wirinde kuba umwana wenyine.

instruction: Ni gute nshobora kumenya ibitekerezo bibi by'ubwoba?
output: Ibitekerezo bibi by'ubwoba ni ibitekerezo bihanze cyangwa bishobora kuba bihatanye. Menya ko ibitekerezo byawe atari ukuri. Jya uhumeka neza, kandi wirinde kugira ibitekerezo bibi. Menya ko ibitekerezo byawe atari wowe.

scenario: A young girl experiencing constant worry and fear about school or social situations
instruction: Ndi kumva nshaka guhunga buri gihe iyo ngize ibibazo. Ni gute nshobora guhagarika kwihisha?
output: Kuba ukeneye guhunga ni ibisanzwe iyo uhangayitse. Gerageza guhagarara no guhumeka cyane. Menya ko guhunga bitakemurwa ibibazo. Shaka umuntu wizera umubwire uburyo wumva umeze. Fata intambwe nto zo kwizera abandi.

scenario: A young girl experiencing constant worry and fear about school or social situations
instruction: Ese guhangayika gukabije gushobora kugira impamvu yo kwigira hejuru?
output: Yego, guhangayika gukabije gushobora kugira impamvu yo kwigira hejuru, kuko umubiri wawe urimo gukora ku buryo umubiri wihutisha. Menya ko ibi ari byiza, kandi birashobora gushira. Hita utekereza ku bintu bitanu ushobora kumenya kugira ngo ugabanye ubwoba.

scenario: A young girl experiencing constant worry and fear about school or social situations
instruction: Ni gute nshobora kwigabanya guhangayika ku bintu bitashoboka gukora?
output: Gerageza kwibanda ku bintu ushobora gukora. Menya ko hari ibintu bidashoboka kugenzura. Kwiga kwirekura ni ingamba nziza. Menya ko nta kigomba kuba neza, kandi uri gukora ibyiza byawe.

scenario: A young girl experiencing constant worry and fear about school or social situations
instruction: Ndi kubona mfite ubwoba bwinshi bwo kuganira mu kibazo (exam). Ni iki nkwiriye gukora?
output: Guhumeka cyane no gufata umwanya wo kuruhuka mbere y'ikibazo byagufasha. Kwiga gahunda kandi ufite umwanya wo kuruhuka byagufasha. Niba bikomeje kugorana, vuga n'umwarimu cyangwa umubyeyi uburyo ufite ubwoba.

scenario: A young girl experiencing constant worry and fear about school or social situations
instruction: Ni gute nshobora kumenya uburyo bwo gusobanura impungenge zanjye ku muntu mukuru?
output: Banza uvuge uti 'Ndashaka kuganira nawe ku kintu kingora.' Sobanura uburyo wumva umeze (urugero: 'Ndi kumva ndatinda mu nda yanjye' cyangwa 'Ndi kumva mfite ubwoba bwinshi'). Menya ko bagomba kumva no kugufasha. Ni ngombwa gushyira ibitekerezo byawe hanze.

scenario: A young girl asking how to stay safe when walking alone or in public places
instruction: Ndi gutinya kugenda njyenyine nijoro cyangwa ahantu hahuze. Ni gute nshobora kwirinda?
output: Gerageza kwirinda kugenda wenyine nijoro. Niba bigenze gutyo, jya unyura mu nzira zizwi cyangwa zifite abantu benshi. Amaso yawe asiganure ibintu bibaho. Niba ubona umuntu atuje, hita ugenda ugerageza kwitandukanya nabo. Genda ufite umutekano ku genda.

scenario: A young girl asking how to stay safe when walking alone or in public places
instruction: Ni iki nkwiriye gukora niba hari umuntu unteye ubwoba cyangwa ansabye ikintu kibi mu nzira?
output: Kuvuga 'Oya' ku buryo buhamye kandi butuje. Niba batumva, hita ugenda ukajya ku bantu benshi cyangwa mu gace kizwi. Niba hari umuntu uguhangayikishije, hita uvuga n'umuntu mukuru wizera. Ntukuremo amaso yawe, kuko gutinya bishobora kugutera ibibazo.

scenario: A young girl asking how to stay safe when walking alone or in public places
instruction: Ese ni byiza kuvuga n'abantu ntazi neza iyo ndi njyenyine?
output: Oya, ntukoreshe cyangwa ngo ushake kuvuga n'abantu utazi neza, cyane cyane iyo uri wenyine. Niba hari umuntu uguhangayikishije cyangwa akubaza ibibazo byawe bwite, hita uvuga uti 'Oya, ntabwo nshaka kuganira' kandi ugende. Umutekano wawe ni ngombwa.

scenario: A young girl asking how to stay safe when walking alone or in public places
instruction: Ni gute nshobora kumenya uburyo bwo kwitwara mu gihe cyo gushaka ubufasha?
output: Shaka ahantu hakomeye cyangwa umuntu mukuru wizera (urugero: umupolisi, umubyeyi, umwarimu, umukozi w'ubuzima). Niba hari umuntu ugushyize mu kaga, hita ugenda ukoresheje guhunga cyangwa kurwana. Kuvuga mu mahoro n'umuntu wizera bishobora kugufasha.

scenario: A young girl asking how to know if someone's behavior towards her is wrong
instruction: Ni iki gitandukanya kuganira gushimishije n'imyitwarire idakwiye?
output: Imyitwarire idakwiye ni iyo umuntu akubaza ibibazo byawe bwite, akugabanya agaciro, cyangwa agukora ku mubiri ku buryo utishimiye. Kugaba inenge ni byiza. Kugaba inenge ku muntu wizera ni ngombwa mu kumenya imyitwarire idakwiye.

scenario: A young girl asking how to know if someone's behavior towards her is wrong
instruction: Niba hari umuntu unkoze ku mubiri ku buryo butari byiza, ni iki nkwiriye gukora?
output: Hita uvuga 'Oya' ku buryo buhamye kandi ukoreshe guhunga. Hita ugenda ukajya ku muntu mukuru wizera (urugero: umubyeyi, umwarimu, umukozi w'ubuzima). Umubyeyi cyangwa umuntu mukuru agomba kumva no kugufasha. Ntugire impamvu yo gutinya, kuko umubiri wawe ari uwawe.

scenario: A young girl asking how to know if someone's behavior towards her is wrong
instruction: Ese ni byiza niba umuntu mukuru ansinze ubwumvikane kuri kanga?
output: Oya, abantu bakuru bagomba kubaha abana. Niba umuntu mukuru akora ikintu kibi, cyangwa akubaza ibibazo byawe bwite, ni ngombwa kubivuga. Umuntu mukuru agomba kukuba ha no kukuremera. Ntugire impamvu yo kumva ubabajwe, kuko umubiri wawe ari uwawe.

scenario: A young girl asking how to know if someone's behavior towards her is wrong
instruction: Niba hari umuntu unsinze kubika ibanga ry'ikintu kibi. Ni iki nkwiriye gukora?
output: Nta mpamvu yo kubika ibanga ry'ikintu kibi. Hita uvuga n'umuntu mukuru wizera. Ibyiza byo kwigabanya ni ngombwa. Menya ko umutekano wawe ari ngombwa kuruta kubika ibanga.

scenario: A young girl asking how to say no when she feels uncomfortable
instruction: Ni gute navuga 'Oya' ku buryo buhamye kandi ntabwo ngira impamvu yo gutinya?
output: Vuga 'Oya' ku buryo buhamye kandi butuje. Niba batumva, ushobora kuvuga uti 'Oya, si ikintu nifuza gukora.' cyangwa 'Ntabwo nshaka ibyo. Niba uri inshuti yanjye, uzumva icyemezo cyanjye.' Gerageza kwitandukanya nabo aho kugira ngo bakugire ikigirwamana.

scenario: A young girl asking how to say no when she feels uncomfortable
instruction: Ni iki nkwiriye gukora niba inshuti zanjye zihindura 'Oya' yanjye?
output: Menya ko ugomba kubaha 'Oya' yawe. Niba inshuti zanjye zihindura 'Oya' yanjye, hita uvuga uti 'Oya, ni ukuri.' Cyangwa 'Ntabwo nshaka ibyo.' Genda ushaka inshuti zikubaha. Nta mpamvu yo gutinya.

scenario: A young girl asking how to say no when she feels uncomfortable
instruction: Ni gute nshobora gushyiraho imipaka hagati y'abantu b'abakobwa n'abahungu?
output: Kugira imipaka ni ngombwa cyane. Menya ibintu udashaka kuganira n'abantu. Niba hari umuntu utarenze imipaka yawe, hita uvuga uti 'Ntabwo nshaka kuganira ku kintu runaka.' cyangwa 'Wemerewe kuva aha hantu.' Menya ko uburenganzira bwawe ari ngombwa.

scenario: A young girl asking how to say no when she feels uncomfortable
instruction: Niba umuntu ansinze kuvuga 'Oya' ku kintu cyiza, ni gute nshobora kumva nta mpamvu yo gutinya?
output: Menya ko umubiri wawe ari uwawe. Kuvuga 'Oya' ni uburenganzira bwawe. Niba umuntu atumva 'Oya' yawe, hita ugenda ukajya ku muntu mukuru wizera. Ntugire impamvu yo gutinya, kuko buri muntu wese agira ibibazo bye.

scenario: A young girl asking who she can talk to if something bad happens
instruction: Ni bande muntu mukuru nshobora kwizera kandi mbashe kubwira ikintu kibi kiba?
output: Shaka umuntu mukuru wizera, nko mu babyeyi bawe, umwarimu, umukozi w'ubuzima, cyangwa umupolisi. Umuntu wizera ni uwo ukubaha, ukubaka, kandi ntagutera gukora ibintu bibi. Niba hari umuntu umwe atumva, shaka undi muntu mukuru.

scenario: A young girl asking who she can talk to if something bad happens
instruction: Ni gute nshobora kumenya niba umuntu mukuru ari umuntu wizera cyangwa ntabwo?
output: Umuntu mukuru wizera ni uwo ukubaha, ukumva, kandi ntagutera gukora ibintu bibi. Niba hari umuntu mukuru akora ikintu kibi, cyangwa agushyiraho igitutu, si umuntu wizera. Gerageza kuvuga n'abantu benshi kugira ngo ugire ubufasha.

scenario: A young girl asking who she can talk to if something bad happens
instruction: Ndi kubona mfite impamvu yo gutinya kuvuga ibyago kiba. Ni gute nshobora kubivuga?
output: Kuvuga ibyago birashobora kugora, ariko ni ngombwa cyane. Banza uvuge uti 'Ndashaka kuganira nawe ku kintu kibi cyambayeho.' Niba ufite impamvu yo gutinya, vuga uti 'Ndashaka kuganira nawe ku kintu kibi, ariko ndatumiwe.' Umuntu mukuru agomba kumva no kugufasha.

scenario: A young girl asking who she can talk to if something bad happens
instruction: Ni gute nshobora gushaka ubufasha niba nta muntu mukuru wizera mfite hafi?
output: Niba nta muntu mukuru wizera ufite hafi, ushobora gushaka ubufasha ku muntu mukuru mu mushinga w'ubuzima, cyangwa ugashaka ubufasha ku murongo wa telefoni w'abana. Ni ngombwa kuvuga ibyago byawe ku muntu mukuru.

scenario: A young girl asking about staying safe on the internet and social media
instruction: Ni ubuhe buryo bwiza bwo kwirinda abantu babi kuri Internet?
output: Nta mpamvu yo kuvuga n'abantu utazi neza. Ntukoreshe amakuru yawe bwite (urugero: izina, aderesi, ifoto y'amaboko) ku mbuga. Wirinde gushyira amakuru yawe bwite ku mbuga, kuko bishobora kugutera ibibazo. Niba hari umuntu uguhangayikishije, hita uvuga n'umubyeyi.

scenario: A young girl asking about staying safe on the internet and social media
instruction: Ese ni byiza gushyira amakuru yawe bwite ku mbuga (social media)?
output: Oya, ntukoreshe cyangwa ngo ushake gushyira amakuru yawe bwite ku mbuga. Ntukoreshe izina ryawe nyakuri, aderesi, cyangwa ifoto y'amaboko. Ibi bishobora kugutera ibibazo. Menya ko abantu babi bashobora gukoresha amakuru yawe mu buryo bubi.

scenario: A young girl asking about staying safe on the internet and social media
instruction: Niba hari umuntu unsinze ku mbuga. Ni iki nkwiriye gukora?
output: Hita uhagarika kuganira nabo. Bwira umubyeyi cyangwa umuntu mukuru wizera. Niba bishoboka, fata agace k'amakuru y'ubutumwa bwabo (screenshot) kugira ngo uvuge n'umuntu mukuru. Ntugire impamvu yo gutinya, kuko buri muntu wese agira ibibazo bye.

scenario: A young girl asking about staying safe on the internet and social media
instruction: Ni gute nshobora kumenya niba umuntu uri kuri Internet ari umuntu mwiza cyangwa umuntu mubi?
output: Nta buryo bworoshye bwo kumenya niba umuntu ari mwiza cyangwa mubi. Menya ko abantu babi bashobora kwihisha. Wirinde kuvuga n'abantu utazi neza. Niba hari umuntu uguhangayikishije cyangwa akubaza ibibazo byawe bwite, hita uvuga n'umubyeyi.

scenario: A young girl asking what personal information she should not share
