scenario: A young girl asking how to identify safe places and people
instruction: Ahantu h'umutekano ni iki? Hari uburyo bwo kubona ahantu heza nko muri Kigali?
output: Ahantu h'umutekano ni ahantu uhumeka, aho wumva uri wenyine kandi ufite umutekano. Ushobora kwigira mu rusengero, igipolisi, cyangwa aho abantu benshi bari. Kwitonda ni ingenzi.

scenario: A young girl experiencing constant worry and fear about school or social situations
instruction: Iyo mfite ubwoba bwinshi, ndumva ngiye kurwara umutwe. Nagira nte ngo nihangane?
output: Guhangayika kenshi gushobora gutera umutwe. Gerageza guhumeka, koga mu mazi ashyushye, cyangwa gukora siporo. Menya ko ukeneye gukira. Niba bikomeye, vugana n'umuganga.

scenario: A young girl feeling sad, hopeless, and losing interest in activities she used to enjoy
instruction: Niba ndi guhangana n'agahinda, ese gukina umuziki bishobora gufasha?
output: Yego, kumva umuziki ukunda cyangwa gukina igikoresho cya muzika bishobora gufasha. Umuziki ugabanya agahinda kandi ugatuma umutima uba mwiza. Kwita ku buzima ni ingenzi.

scenario: A young girl feeling overwhelmed with school, family, or social pressures
instruction: Ni iki kibi cyo kwikina (procrastinate) cyane?
output: Kwikina (procrastination) byongerera 'stress' kuko uguma utuwe. Gerageza gukora imirimo yawe mu byiciro, kandi ufate umwanya wo kuruhuka. Kwihangana ni ingenzi.

scenario: A young girl struggling with low self-confidence and self-worth
instruction: Hari abandi bankina ku mubiri. Nagira nte ngo niyizere?
output: Amagambo y'abandi ntagomba kukuvutsa agaciro. Wibuke ko uri umukobwa w'agaciro. Vuga uti 'Amagambo yawe ntacyo ampinduraho.' Shyiraho intego nkawe, kandi ukomeze kugerageza. Kwizera kwawe kuzatuma uhagarara neza.

scenario: A young girl having difficulty managing her emotions and reactions
instruction: Iyo narakaye cyane, umutima wanjye uhita usimbagurika. Nagira nte ngo ntange umwanya wo gutuza?
output: Iyo ugiye kurakara, humeka cyane, jya ku ruhande, cyangwa uvuge uti 'ndasubira nyuma.' Kora ibi kugeza igihe wumva utuje. Kwigenzura ni ingenzi.

scenario: A young girl struggling to adapt to changes in her life or family
instruction: Ababyeyi banjye barimo gutandukana, kandi ndahangayitse. Nagira nte ngo menye guhangana n'ibihe bishya?
output: Ni byiza kwemera ko ukeneye umwanya wo kwemera impinduka. Menya ko ukeneye kuvuga ibyiyumviro byawe ku muntu wizeye. Kwita ku buzima bwawe bwite ni ingenzi. Wibuke ko utari ikosa ryawe, kandi ibi bizashira.

scenario: A young girl asking how to take care of her mental and emotional well-being
instruction: Ni ibiki byo kwikora nshobora gukora mu buriri kugira ngo nduhuke?
output: Mu buriri, shaka umwanya wo gusoma igitabo, gutega amatwi umuziki woroshye, cyangwa kwandika ibyo wize mu gitabo. Irinde gufata telefone cyangwa 'tablet' mu buriri. Ibyo bizagufasha kuruhuka neza, kandi bikurinde ibyiyumviro by'ibibi.

scenario: A young girl experiencing bullying at school or online
instruction: Umuntu arimo kunsetsa ku ishuri, kandi simenya icyo gukora. Nagira nte ngo nihangane?
output: Niba bakina ku mubiri wawe cyangwa bakwangiza, irinde kumva ugira uburakari. Menya ko atari ikosa ryawe, kandi ko ari bo bafite ikibazo. Bwira umuntu mukuru ako kanya. Kwirinda ni byiza kuruta kwishora mu ntonganya.

scenario: A young girl feeling isolated and disconnected from others
instruction: Nihumva ndi wenyine, byandenze. Hari uburyo bwo gukira?
output: Shaka umuntu, nka inshuti ya hafi, umuryango, cyangwa umujyanama wo kuganira. Jya ugera aho abantu babarirwa. Menya ko abandi nabo banyura muri ibyo. Kwiyizera bizagufasha kubona inshuti nshya.

scenario: A young girl having difficulty expressing her feelings and needs
instruction: Kuvugisha inshuti zanjye birangora. Nagira nte ngo mbe mushya mu mvugo?
output: Menya ibyo ushaka kuvuga, wivuge buhoro kandi mu mvugo igaragara. Shakisha abantu uzagiraho inshuti. Niba bigoye, andika ibyiyumviro byawe, hanyuma ubihe umuntu wizeye. Uko ugenda uganira ni ko ugenda uba mushya.

scenario: A young girl who has experienced a traumatic event and needs support
instruction: Kuba mwaranyuze mu kibazo gikomeye, ese mfite umutekano? Hari icyo nshobora gukora kugira ngo ntekereze ibyiza?
output: Yego, ufite umutekano. Wemerere umutima wawe kurohuka. Gerageza gukora ibyo usanzwe ukunda gukora, kandi ushakishe ubufasha bw'umujyanama. Wibuke ko igihe kirekire kizagufasha gukira. Kwita ku buzima bwawe ni ingenzi.

scenario: A young girl asking how to become stronger and bounce back from difficulties
instruction: Ni iki nshobora gukora kugira ngo ntekereze ibyiza mu bibazo bikomeye?
output: Gerageza kumenya ko ibibazo bizashira. Shakisha ibyiza mu buzima bwawe, kandi wibande ku ngaruka zawe nziza. Kwizera no gukora siporo byoroshye birafasha. Kwigira imbaraga bizagufasha kumenya guhangana n'ibibazo.

scenario: A young girl asking about her first period, what to expect, and how to manage it
instruction: Igihe cy'ukwezi cyanjye ntikimara iminsi imwe buri kwezi. Ese ndi murwayi?
output: Igihe cy'ukwezi (imihango) cy'umukobwa ntabwo buri gihe kiba kimara iminsi imwe cyangwa kigera ku gihe kimwe buri kwezi. Ni ibisanzwe, cyane cyane mu gihe cy'ubukumi. Ariko niba bikubaho igihe kinini cyane, cyangwa amaraso aba menshi cyane, ni byiza kuganira n'umuganga. Kutagerageza kubara umubare w'iminsi.

scenario: A young girl asking about how her body changes during puberty
instruction: Ni izihe ndwara z'imyororokere nkwiriye kwirinda cyangwa kumenya?
output: Ni byiza kumenya ku bijyanye n'indwara zandurira mu mibonano mpuzabitsina, nka SIDA (HIV) n'izindi. Kwirinda ni ingenzi: kuganira n'ababyeyi, kwirinda ubusambanyi, no kumenya uko wirinda. Niba ufite impungenge, vugana n'umuganga.

scenario: A young girl confused about physical changes happening to her body
instruction: Amabere yanjye ntabwo angana, rimwe riruta irindi. Ese ni ibintu bibi?
output: Oya, ni ibisanzwe rwose! Amabere y'abakobwa benshi ntabwo angana neza mu gihe cyo gukura. Ibi bishobora kuguma uko bihora, kandi nta kibazo gihari. Niba ufite ububabare, vugana n'umuganga.

scenario: A young girl asking about proper hygiene practices during her period
instruction: Ese ni byiza gukoresha imiti y'umubiri ku gitsina mu gihe cy'imihango?
output: Oya, si byiza gukoresha imiti y'umubiri (perfumes/sprays) ku gitsina, kabone niyo waba uri mu gihe cy'imihango. Iyo miti ishobora kuguha uburozi. Gukoresha amazi meza n'isabune gusa birahagije. Kwirinda ni ingenzi.

scenario: A young girl asking what consent means and how to recognize it
instruction: Umuntu ashobora kwemeranya (consent) ryari? Ese niba yacecetse bivuze ko yemeye?
output: Oya, guceceka ntabwo bivuze kwemeranya. Ubwemeranye bugomba kuba busobanutse, bwishyuwe, kandi buhoraho (bushobora guhagarara igihe icyo aricyo cyose). Ni ngombwa ko umuntu avuga ati 'Yego' cyangwa agahita agaragaza ko ashaka. Iyo umuntu acecetse, ni ukutamenya neza, kandi iyo utamenye neza, bivuze 'Oya'.

scenario: A young girl asking about what makes a healthy relationship with peers
instruction: Ni izihe ngingo z'ingenzi zikwiriye kuba mu mubano mwiza n'inshuti zanjye?
output: Ingingo z'ingenzi ni ukwizera, kubahana, gushyigikirana, no kuvugisha ukuri. Mu mubano mwiza, buri wese agomba kumva afite agaciro, yumviswe, kandi ntawe uhata undi. Muganire ku bibazo mugire, kandi mwemere ko buri wese atandukanye n'undi. Kwishimira ibyiza by'undi ni byiza.

scenario: A young girl feeling pressured by friends to do something she's uncomfortable with
instruction: Inshuti zanjye zinkina ku mubiri cyangwa zinkoresha amagambo nkomeye ngo nange na bo. Nagira nte ngo ndeke kubihatirwa?
output: Kuvuga 'Oya' birakwiriye! Gerageza guhagarara ku cyemezo cyawe, niba bigoye cyane, shaka umwanya wo kubavaho. Tekereza ku byiza byawe wenyine. Ni byiza kugira inshuti zicye ariko zikubaha, kuruta kugira inshuti nyinshi ariko zikuvutsa agaciro. Wibuke ko agaciro kawe kari imbere ya byose.

scenario: A young girl struggling with how she looks and comparing herself to others
instruction: Nanga uko nsa, abandi bakobwa bose basa neza kundusha. Nabasha nte kwikunda?
output: Umubiri wawe ni mwiza, uko waba umeze kose. Irinde kwigereranya n'abandi, kuko buri wese agira uko Imana yamuremye. Konera ku bintu byiza ukunda kuri wowe, ukore ibintu bikunezeza, kandi ubyemere ko n'abandi bafite ibyiza byabo. Kwiyakira ni urugendo, ariko urugero. Abantu bose ni beza, n'ubwo basa batandukanye.

scenario: A young girl asking how to stay safe when walking alone or in public places
instruction: Niba mbona umuntu ansatira mu muhanda, nakora iki?
output: Niba wumva ufite ubwoba, jya ugenda wihuta, cyangwa ukinjire ahantu hari abantu benshi, nk'iduka cyangwa ibiro. Ushobora no kuvuza induru ukavuga uti 'Nkeneye ubufasha!' kugira ngo abantu baguhagarare iruhande. Kwirinda ni byiza kuruta kwishora mu kaga.

scenario: A young girl asking how to know if someone's behavior towards her is wrong
instruction: Umuntu mukuru aransaba ko twahura mu bwihisho. Ese byaba bibi?
output: Ibyo si byiza na gato! Umuntu mukuru w'umwizerwa ntazigera agusaba gukora ibintu mu bwihisho utaraganiriye n'ababyeyi bawe. Niba bikubayeho, bwira umuntu mukuru wizeye ako kanya, kandi ntugere aho yagutumye. Kwitonda ni ngombwa cyane.

scenario: A young girl asking how to say no when she feels uncomfortable
instruction: Hari umuntu uhagaritse, ndashaka kumubwira 'Oya' ariko birandenga. Nagira nte?
output: Gutanga imbago (boundaries) ni ingenzi cyane. Ni uburenganzira bwawe bwo kuvuga 'Oya' nta mpamvu, kandi ntugomba gusobanurira impamvu. Bwira umuntu uti 'Ndabona atari byiza', 'Oya, sinkeka ko nabikora', cyangwa 'Ibyo sinabikora.' Gira ijwi ryawe rigaragara kandi ry'ikimanzu, kandi wifate neza.

scenario: A young girl asking who she can talk to if something bad happens
instruction: Ni bangahe abantu nkwiriye kugira ngo mba nizeye neza?
output: Ni byiza kugira byibuze abantu babiri (2) cyangwa batatu (3) b'abantu bakuru b'umwizerwa. Iyo umwe adahari cyangwa utarabonye umwanya wo kumubwira, ubasha kuganira n'undi. Abo bantu bagomba kuba bakumva, bakaguha umwanya, kandi bakagushyigikira.

scenario: A young girl asking about staying safe on the internet and social media
instruction: Niki nkwiriye kwirinda gukora kuri 'social media' kugira ngo ngume mfite umutekano?
output: Ntugomba guha abantu batazwi amazina yawe, nomero za telefoni, cyangwa ifoto yawe. Irinde kuvuga n'abantu utazi mu buzima busanzwe, kandi ntujye guhura n'umuntu wahuriye nawe kuri internet wenyine. Tekereza mbere yo kohereza cyangwa kwakira ibintu bififitse. Kubika amabanga yawe ni ingenzi.

scenario: A young girl asking what personal information she should not share
instruction: Ni ibiki byanjye byihariye ntagomba na rimwe gusangiza abantu?
output: Amafoto yawe cyangwa ya bagenzi bawe yihariye, nomero y'indangamuntu, nomero za konti, nomero za telefoni, imyirondoro y'ababyeyi bawe, n'aho utuye. Ibi byose bigomba kuguma mu bwihisho. Izi ni "Informations Personnelles" zikwiriye gukomeza kuba iz'ibanga ryawe.

scenario: A young girl asking what to do when someone gives her unwanted attention
instruction: Hari umuntu unyitaho kandi ntacyo mushaka. Nagira nte?
output: Ubwa mbere, bwira uwo muntu mu buryo busanzwe ariko bwihuse uti: 'Ndashaka ko undeka.' Niba akomeje, menya ko ushobora kumusiga, ugenda ukinjira mu bantu benshi, cyangwa ukabwira umuntu mukuru wizeye ngo agufashe. Ntugomba kwihanganira ibyo udashaka.

scenario: A young girl asking how to identify safe places and people
instruction: Nabasha nte kumenya ahantu h'umutekano n'abantu b'umutekano?
output: Ahantu h'umutekano ni ahantu uhumeka, aho wumva uri wenyine kandi ufite umutekano, nk'ikigo cy'amashuri, urusengero, cyangwa kwa Mama wawe. Abantu b'umutekano ni abakubaha, bakumva, barakutinyana kandi bagashyigikira. Uwo muntu azakubaho kandi akaba inshuti yawe ya hafi.

scenario: A young girl experiencing constant worry and fear about school or social situations
instruction: Ndagira ngo menye, ese guhangayika bihinduka indwara gute?
output: Guhangayika (worry) biba indwara iyo biba byinshi cyane, bigatuma ubuzima bwawe bwa buri munsi bugorana. Ibyo bishobora gutuma uhora ufite ubwoba, kugira umutima usimbagurika, cyangwa kubura ibitotsi. Niba ibi biba kenshi, ni byiza kuganira n'umujyanama cyangwa umuganga.

scenario: A young girl feeling sad, hopeless, and losing interest in activities she used to enjoy
instruction: Niba ndi guhangana n'agahinda, ni iki nshobora gukora kugira ngo nibeshye?
output: Nubwo bigoye, gerageza gukora ibyo usanzwe ukunda gukora (nko gusoma, gukina, cyangwa kumva indirimbo). Kurya neza, kuryama, no gukina siporo ni ingenzi cyane. Vugana n'inshuti zawe zizaguha umwanya, kandi wibuke ko atari ikosa ryawe. Ukeneye gukira.

scenario: A young girl feeling overwhelmed with school, family, or social pressures
instruction: Iyo 'stress' indega, umutima wanjye uhita usimbagurika. Nagira nte ngo ntange umwanya wo kuruhuka?
output: Iyo 'stress' ibayeho, humeka cyane, cyangwa ugerageze kuvuga ibintu 5 ubona, 4 wumva, 3 uhumeka, 2 ugeraho, 1 uva. Kwirinda guhagarika imirimo, gufata umwanya wo gukina, no kuruhuka. Urubanza rwawe rukwiriye kugira umwanya wo gukira.

scenario: A young girl struggling with low self-confidence and self-worth
instruction: Hari inshuti zanjye zinkina ku mubiri zivuga ko ntacyo maze. Nagira nte ngo niyizere?
output: Amagambo y'abandi ntagomba kukuvutsa agaciro. Wibuke ko uri umukobwa w'agaciro. Vuga uti 'Amagambo yawe ntacyo ampinduraho.' Shyiraho intego nkawe, kandi ukomeze kugerageza. Kwizera kwawe kuzatuma uhagarara neza.

scenario: A young girl having difficulty managing her emotions and reactions
instruction: Ibyiyumviro byanjye birahindagurika cyane. Nagira nte ngo menye kubigenzura neza?
output: Gerageza kumenya impamvu ibyiyumviro byawe bihinduka. Ushobora kwandika ibikubabaje mu gitabo, cyangwa ukavuga uko wumva umeze ku muntu wizeye. Menya ko byiza byose ari ngombwa. Humeka cyane, kuko bigufasha gutuza.

scenario: A young girl struggling to adapt to changes in her life or family
instruction: Impinduka z'ubuzima zituma nshaka kuguma mu buriri. Hari uburyo bwo kwiyemeza?
output: Tangira ugenda gake, wiyemeze gukora ikintu gito. Ushobora kwigira gusa iminota 10 cyangwa kuvugana n'inshuti. Kwihangana no kwiyemeza bizagufasha kumenyera impinduka. Kwizera ni ingenzi.

scenario: A young girl asking how to take care of her mental and emotional well-being
instruction: Ni ibiki byo kwikora nshobora gukora kugira ngo ngume mfite ubuzima bwiza mu mutwe?
output: Kwita ku buzima bw'umutwe 'self-care' bivuze kuruhuka neza, kurya neza, gukora siporo, gukina ibyo ukunda, no gutanga umwanya ku bandi. Jya uganira n'inshuti, kora ibigutwara byinshi, kandi ujye uhorana umwanya wo gutekereza ku byiza. Kwiyitaho ni ukwiyubaha.

scenario: A young girl asking what consent means and how to recognize it
instruction: Niba mbanje kwemeranya, nshobora guhindura ibyemezo byanjye? ese ndashobora kuvuga 'Oya' nyuma?
output: Yego, ubwemeranye bugomba kuba bushobora guhagarara igihe icyo aricyo cyose. Niba wemeye gukora ikintu, ariko nyuma ukumva udashaka, ufite uburenganzira bwo kuvuga 'Oya.' 'Oya' iba 'Oya' rwose. Ni uburenganzira bwawe bwo kwiyemeza.

scenario: A young girl asking about what makes a healthy relationship with peers
instruction: Ni iki nshobora gukora kugira ngo nige kubwizwa ukuri mu mubano w'inshuti?
output: Ukwizera n'ukuri ni ingenzi. Vuga ibyiyumviro byawe mu buryo bwiza kandi bwubaka, kandi utegereze ko n'abandi bakubwiza ukuri. Iyo umuntu ahisha byinshi, uwo si umubano mwiza. Kwizera bizagufasha mu mubano.

scenario: A young girl feeling pressured by friends to do something she's uncomfortable with
instruction: Inshuti zanjye zinkina ku mubiri zivuga ko niba ntibigenzuye, ntashobora kuba umwe muri bo. Nagira nte?
output: Inshuti z'ukuri ntizishobora kuguhatira gukora ibyo udashaka. Wowe vuga 'Oya' mu buryo bwihuse kandi ushikamye. Niba bigoye, shakisha inshuti nshya zizagushyigikira. Agaciro kawe kari imbere ya byose.

scenario: A young girl struggling with how she looks and comparing herself to others
instruction: Amafoto yo kuri internet atuma nanga uko nsa. Nagira nte ngo menye kwiyakira?
output: Menya ko amafoto menshi yo kuri internet aba yahinduwe (edited) atari ukuri. Kwiyakira bivuze kwikundira uwo uri we, uko umeze, n'ibyo ushobora. Fata umwanya wo gukora ibyo ukunda, wibande ku ngaruka zawe nziza. Umubiri wawe ni mwiza, ukore uko bishoboka kugira ngo ukunde uko umeze.

scenario: A young girl asking how to stay safe when walking alone or in public places
instruction: Niba ndi njyenyine nijoro, ese umuziki kuri telefoni uba mwiza? cyangwa urinde?
output: Niba ugenda nijoro, ni byiza kutumva umuziki cyangwa kuvugira kuri telefone. Gendana umutima ugenda, kandi wumve ibikuri iruhande. Ibyo bizagufasha kwirinda ikibazo cyose cyaba gishobora kukubaho. Kugira amaso n'amatwi ku byawe ni ingenzi.

scenario: A young girl asking how to know if someone's behavior towards her is wrong
instruction: Ni iki gikwiye gukorwa mu gihe mbona umuntu akora ibidakwiriye ku mwana muto?
output: Bwira umuntu mukuru wizeye cyangwa umukozi wa Leta ako kanya. Ni ngombwa ko ubivuga, n'ubwo wumva ufite ubwoba. Kurinda abana bato ni inshingano ya buri wese. Ubwo butumwa ni ingenzi cyane.

scenario: A young girl asking how to say no when she feels uncomfortable
instruction: Nihumva ntashaka gukora ikintu, nabwira nte umuntu 'Oya' adakaye?
output: Vuga 'Oya' mu buryo bworoshye kandi bushikamye. Ushobora kuvuga uti, 'Oya, sinabikora,' cyangwa 'Ndabona ntacyo mbashe gukora ubu.' Ntugomba gusobanura impamvu. Gutanga imbago ni uburyo bwo kwiyubaha no kurinda umutekano wawe.

scenario: A young girl asking who she can talk to if something bad happens
instruction: Ese umuntu wizeye ashobora kubika ibanga ry'ikibazo kinini?
output: Umuntu wizeye agomba kubika ibanga, ariko niba ari ikibazo cy'umutekano cyangwa ubugizi bwa nabi, agomba kubwira abakwiriye kugira ngo bagufashe. Ni ngombwa ko utarinda ubuzima bwawe. Icy'ingenzi ni uko umutekano wawe uhagarara ku gukira.

scenario: A young girl asking about staying safe on the internet and social media
instruction: Ese ni byiza kwakira inshuti (friend request) z'abantu batazwi kuri Facebook?
output: Oya, si byiza na gato. Kuri 'social media', ukwiye gukurikira gusa inshuti zawe wizeye. Abantu batazwi bashobora kuba bafite intego mbi. Kwirinda ni byiza kuruta kwishora mu kaga. Gira umutima usanzwe.

scenario: A young girl asking what personal information she should not share
instruction: Niba hari umuntu umpamagaye kuri telefoni, ese nagira nte ngo menye ko adakeneye amazina yanjye?
output: Nta mpamvu yagira gutanga amazina yawe cyangwa izindi ngero zawe bwite kuri telefone niba utazi uwo muvugana. Niba bakomeje kukuhatiriza, vuga uti 'Simpamya ko waba uzi neza,' hanyuma uhagarike umuhamagaro. Niba byaba bihangayikishije, bwira umuntu mukuru wizeye.

scenario: A young girl asking what to do when someone gives her unwanted attention
instruction: Umuntu yanyandikiye kuri 'social media' ankoraho ibintu bibi, kandi ndashaka ko ambeshya. Nagira nte?
output: Hagarika kuvugana n'uwo muntu, umukure kuri 'friend list', kandi umubloke (block). Niba ushobora, fata ifoto (screenshot) y'ubwo butumwa hanyuma ugaragaze kuri umuntu mukuru wizeye cyangwa umukozi ushinzwe umutekano. Wibuke ko atari ikosa ryawe, kandi ugomba kurinda umutekano wawe.

scenario: A young girl asking how to identify safe places and people
instruction: Ni ibihe bimenyetso bigaragaza ko umuntu ari 'safe' (mwiza) kwizerwa?
output: Umuntu w'umwizerwa ni umuntu ukumva, ugukundira uwo uri we, utaguha akato, kandi ugushyigikira. Nta na rimwe azaguha igitugu, aguhate, cyangwa aguteshe agaciro. Abantu b'umwizerwa bakubaha 'boundaries' zawe. Mufashe gutandukanya ibyiza n'ibibi.

scenario: A young girl experiencing constant worry and fear about school or social situations
instruction: Iyo mfite ubwoba bwinshi, ndumva ntabasha guhumeka. Hari uburyo bwo guhumeka bworoshye?
output: Gerageza guhumeka mu gihe cyo guhangayika: humeka cyane, ubike umwuka, hanyuma usohore umwuka gahoro gahoro. Kora ibi inshuro eshanu. Ibi bifasha guhindura imbaraga z'ubwoba no gutuza umutima wawe. Kwita ku buzima bwawe ni ingenzi.

scenario: A young girl feeling sad, hopeless, and losing interest in activities she used to enjoy
instruction: Niba numva mfite agahinda, ese ni byiza kwirinda abantu?
output: Oya, si byiza kwirinda abantu buri gihe. Gukorana n'inshuti zawe byoroshye bishobora gufasha. Gushaka umwanya wo kuvuga uko wumva umeze bizagufasha gukira. Kwita ku buzima ni ingenzi.

scenario: A young girl feeling overwhelmed with school, family, or social pressures
instruction: Iyo 'stress' indega, umutima wanjye uhita usimbagurika. Nagira nte ngo ntange umwanya wo kuruhuka?
output: Iyo 'stress' ibayeho, humeka cyane, cyangwa ugerageze kuvuga ibintu 5 ubona, 4 wumva, 3 uhumeka, 2 ugeraho, 1 uva. Kwirinda guhagarika imirimo, gufata umwanya wo gukina, no kuruhuka. Urubanza rwawe rukwiriye kugira umwanya wo gukira.

scenario: A young girl struggling with low self-confidence and self-worth
instruction: Hari inshuti zanjye zinkina ku mubiri zivuga ko ntacyo maze. Nagira nte ngo niyizere?
output: Amagambo y'abandi ntagomba kukuvutsa agaciro. Wibuke ko uri umukobwa w'agaciro. Vuga uti 'Amagambo yawe ntacyo ampinduraho.' Shyiraho intego nkawe, kandi ukomeze kugerageza. Kwizera kwawe kuzatuma uhagarara neza.

scenario: A young girl having difficulty managing her emotions and reactions
instruction: Ibyiyumviro byanjye birahindagurika cyane. Nagira nte ngo menye kubigenzura neza?
output: Gerageza kumenya impamvu ibyiyumviro byawe bihinduka. Ushobora kwandika ibikubabaje mu gitabo. Kuruhuka neza, kurya neza, no gukina siporo birafasha. Menya ko byiza byose ari ngombwa. Humeka cyane.

scenario: A young girl struggling to adapt to changes in her life or family
instruction: Impinduka z'ubuzima zituma nshaka kuguma mu buriri. Hari uburyo bwo kwiyemeza?
output: Tangira ugenda gake, wiyemeze gukora ikintu gito. Ushobora kwigira gusa iminota 10 cyangwa kuvugana n'inshuti. Kwihangana no kwiyemeza bizagufasha kumenyera impinduka. Kwizera ni ingenzi.

scenario: A young girl asking how to take care of her mental and emotional well-being
instruction: Ni ibiki byo kwikora nshobora gukora mu buriri kugira ngo nduhuke?
output: Mu buriri, shaka umwanya wo gusoma igitabo, gutega amatwi umuziki woroshye, cyangwa kwandika ibyo wize mu gitabo. Irinde gufata telefone cyangwa 'tablet' mu buriri. Ibyo bizagufasha kuruhuka neza, kandi bikurinde ibyiyumviro by'ibibi.

scenario: A young girl experiencing bullying at school or online
instruction: Umuntu arimo kunsetsa ku ishuri, kandi simenya icyo gukora. Nagira nte ngo nihangane?
output: Niba bakina ku mubiri wawe cyangwa bakwangiza, irinde kumva ugira uburakari. Menya ko atari ikosa ryawe, kandi ko ari bo bafite ikibazo. Bwira umuntu mukuru ako kanya. Kwirinda ni byiza kuruta kwishora mu ntonganya.

scenario: A young girl feeling isolated and disconnected from others
instruction: Nihumva ndi wenyine, byandenze. Hari uburyo bwo gukira?
output: Shaka umuntu, nka inshuti ya hafi, umuryango, cyangwa umujyanama wo kuganira. Jya ugera aho abantu babarirwa. Menya ko abandi nabo banyura muri ibyo. Kwiyizera bizagufasha kubona inshuti nshya.

scenario: A young girl having difficulty expressing her feelings and needs
instruction: Kuvugisha inshuti zanjye birangora. Nagira nte ngo mbe mushya mu mvugo?
output: Menya ibyo ushaka kuvuga, wivuge buhoro kandi mu mvugo igaragara. Shakisha abantu uzagiraho inshuti. Niba bigoye, andika ibyiyumviro byawe, hanyuma ubihe umuntu wizeye. Uko ugenda uganira ni ko ugenda uba mushya.

scenario: A young girl who has experienced a traumatic event and needs support
instruction: Kuba mwaranyuze mu kibazo gikomeye, ese mfite umutekano? Hari icyo nshobora gukora kugira ngo ntekereze ibyiza?
output: Yego, ufite umutekano. Wemerere umutima wawe kurohuka. Gerageza gukora ibyo usanzwe ukunda gukora, kandi ushakishe ubufasha bw'umujyanama. Wibuke ko igihe kirekire kizagufasha gukira. Kwita ku buzima bwawe ni ingenzi.

scenario: A young girl asking how to become stronger and bounce back from difficulties
instruction: Ni iki nshobora gukora kugira ngo ntekereze ibyiza mu bibazo bikomeye?
output: Gerageza kumenya ko ibibazo bizashira. Shakisha ibyiza mu buzima bwawe, kandi wibande ku ngaruka zawe nziza. Kwizera no gukora siporo byoroshye birafasha. Kwigira imbaraga bizagufasha kumenya guhangana n'ibibazo.

scenario: A young girl asking about her first period, what to expect, and how to manage it
instruction: Igihe cy'ukwezi cyanjye ntikimara iminsi imwe buri kwezi. Ese ndi murwayi?
output: Igihe cy'ukwezi (imihango) cy'umukobwa ntabwo buri gihe kiba kimara iminsi imwe cyangwa kigera ku gihe kimwe buri kwezi. Ni ibisanzwe, cyane cyane mu gihe cy'ubukumi. Ariko niba bikubaho igihe kinini cyane, cyangwa amaraso aba menshi cyane, ni byiza kuganira n'umuganga. Kutagerageza kubara umubare w'iminsi.

scenario: A young girl asking about how her body changes during puberty
instruction: Ni izihe ndwara z'imyororokere nkwiriye kwirinda cyangwa kumenya?
output: Ni byiza kumenya ku bijyanye n'indwara zandurira mu mibonano mpuzabitsina, nka SIDA (HIV) n'izindi. Kwirinda ni ingenzi: kuganira n'ababyeyi, kwirinda ubusambanyi, no kumenya uko wirinda. Niba ufite impungenge, vugana n'umuganga.

scenario: A young girl confused about physical changes happening to her body
instruction: Amabere yanjye ntabwo angana, rimwe riruta irindi. Ese ni ibintu bibi?
output: Oya, ni ibisanzwe rwose! Amabere y'abakobwa benshi ntabwo angana neza mu gihe cyo gukura. Ibi bishobora kuguma uko bihora, kandi nta kibazo gihari. Niba ufite ububabare, vugana n'umuganga.

scenario: A young girl asking about proper hygiene practices during her period
instruction: Ese ni byiza gukoresha imiti y'umubiri ku gitsina mu gihe cy'imihango?
output: Oya, si byiza gukoresha imiti y'umubiri (perfumes/sprays) ku gitsina, kabone niyo waba uri mu gihe cy'imihango. Iyo miti ishobora kuguha uburozi. Gukoresha amazi meza n'isabune gusa birahagije. Kwirinda ni ingenzi.

scenario: A young girl asking what consent means and how to recognize it
instruction: Niba mbanje kwemeranya, nshobora guhindura ibyemezo byanjye? ese ndashobora kuvuga 'Oya' nyuma?
output: Yego, ubwemeranye bugomba kuba bushobora guhagarara igihe icyo aricyo cyose. Niba wemeye gukora ikintu, ariko nyuma ukumva udashaka, ufite uburenganzira bwo kuvuga 'Oya.' 'Oya' iba 'Oya' rwose. Ni uburenganzira bwawe bwo kwiyemeza.

scenario: A young girl asking about what makes a healthy relationship with peers
instruction: Ni iki nshobora gukora kugira ngo nige kubwizwa ukuri mu mubano w'inshuti?
output: Ukwizera n'ukuri ni ingenzi. Vuga ibyiyumviro byawe mu buryo bwiza kandi bwubaka, kandi utegereze ko n'abandi bakubwiza ukuri. Iyo umuntu ahisha byinshi, uwo si umubano mwiza. Kwizera bizagufasha mu mubano.

scenario: A young girl feeling pressured by friends to do something she's uncomfortable with
instruction: Iyo nshuti zanjye zihata gukora ibyo ntabasha, nshobora se kuvuga 'Oya' ntangaye?
output: Yego, urashobora rwose. Vuga 'Oya' mu buryo bworoshye kandi buhamye, urugero: 'Ndashimye ariko oya, sinshobora kubikora.' Ntugomba gusobanura impamvu. Gutanga imbago ni uburenganzira bwawe bwa mbere. Inshuti nziza zizakwumva.

scenario: A young girl struggling with how she looks and comparing herself to others
instruction: Amafoto yo kuri internet atuma nanga uko nsa. Nagira nte ngo menye kwiyakira?
output: Menya ko amafoto menshi yo kuri internet aba yahinduwe (edited) atari ukuri. Kwiyakira bivuze kwikundira uwo uri we, uko umeze, n'ibyo ushobora. Fata umwanya wo gukora ibyo ukunda, wibande ku ngaruka zawe nziza. Umubiri wawe ni mwiza, ukore uko bishoboka kugira ngo ukunde uko umeze.

scenario: A young girl asking how to stay safe when walking alone or in public places
instruction: Niba ndi njyenyine nijoro, ese umuziki kuri telefoni uba mwiza? cyangwa urinde?
output: Niba ugenda nijoro, ni byiza kutumva umuziki cyangwa kuvugira kuri telefone. Gendana umutima ugenda, kandi wumve ibikuri iruhande. Ibyo bizagufasha kwirinda ikibazo cyose cyaba gishobora kukubaho. Kugira amaso n'amatwi ku byawe ni ingenzi.

scenario: A young girl asking how to know if someone's behavior towards her is wrong
instruction: Ni iki gikwiye gukorwa mu gihe mbona umuntu akora ibidakwiriye ku mwana muto?
output: Bwira umuntu mukuru wizeye cyangwa umukozi wa Leta ako kanya. Ni ngombwa ko ubivuga, n'ubwo wumva ufite ubwoba. Kurinda abana bato ni inshingano ya buri wese. Ubwo butumwa ni ingenzi cyane.

scenario: A young girl asking how to say no when she feels uncomfortable
instruction: Nihumva ntashaka gukora ikintu, nabwira nte umuntu 'Oya' adakaye?
output: Vuga 'Oya' mu buryo bworoshye kandi bushikamye. Ushobora kuvuga uti, 'Oya, sinabikora,' cyangwa 'Ndabona ntacyo mbashe gukora ubu.' Ntugomba gusobanura impamvu. Gutanga imbago ni uburyo bwo kwiyubaha no kurinda umutekano wawe.

output: Guhangayika (worry) biba indwara iyo biba byinshi cyane, bigatuma ubuzima bwawe bwa buri munsi bugorana. Ibyo bishobora gutuma uhora ufite ubwoba, kugira umutima usimbagurika, cyangwa kubura ibitotsi. Niba ibi biba kenshi, ni byiza kuganira n'umujyanama cyangwa umuganga.

output: Mu gihe cy'imihango, ni byiza kurya ibyo kurya bikungahaye ku cyuma (iron) nko mu bishyimbo n'ibijumba, kuko amaraso aba yatakaye. Kunywa amazi menshi ni ingenzi cyane. Irinde ikawa n'ibyokurya biryoshyoheye cyane, kandi jya unywa icyayi cyangwa amazi y'akanya kugira ngo wirinde kurwara umutwe.

scenario: A young girl asking about how her body changes during puberty
instruction: Ese ubuzima bw'imyororokere bushobora kubaho ku bakobwa gusa? cyangwa no ku bahungu?
output: Ubuzima bw'imyororokere ni ubw'abagabo n'abagore, abakobwa n'abahungu. Bivuze ko buri wese agomba kumenya uko umubiri we ukora, uko yirinda indwara, no kumenya kugira ibyemezo byiza. Ni ingenzi ku bose kugira ubumenyi.

scenario: A young girl confused about physical changes happening to her body
instruction: Inkweto zanjye zirankura vuba. Ese amaguru yanjye azakomeza gukura cyane?
output: Mu gihe cyo gukura, ni ibisanzwe ko ingingo zimwe zikura vuba kurusha izindi, cyane cyane amaguru n'amaboko. Bizaza gahoro gahoro kandi bizahinduka. Menya ko umubiri wawe urimo gukura ugenda wiyubaka. Kwiyakira ni ingenzi.

scenario: A young girl asking about proper hygiene practices during her period
instruction: Hari umwuka mubi numva unje mu gihe cy'imihango. Ni iki nshobora gukora?
output: Umwuka mubi (impumuro) ushobora kubaho, ariko si kenshi. Ni ngombwa guhindura udu-pad kenshi, byibuze buri masaha 4-6, no kwiyuhagira kabiri ku munsi. Niba umwuka ari mubi cyane, jya kureba umuganga kuko bishobora kuba ikimenyetso cy'ikibazo.

scenario: A young girl asking what consent means and how to recognize it
instruction: Ubwemeranye bugomba kuba bwishyuwe (willing). Ese ni iki bivuze?
output: Kuba bwishyuwe bivuze ko umuntu abigira ntawe umuhatiye, ntawe umuha igitugu, kandi ntawe umutinya. Bugomba kuba bwoherejwe n'umutima, atari ubwoba cyangwa igitugu. Ntawe ugomba guhatiriza umuntu. Ufite uburenganzira bwo kuvuga 'Oya'.

scenario: A young girl asking about what makes a healthy relationship with peers
instruction: Ni izihe ngeso nziza zikwiriye kuba mu nshuti yanjye?
output: Inshuti nziza ni umuntu ukubaha, ukwumva, ugushyigikira, kandi ugukundira uwo uri we. Agomba kuba yubaha 'boundaries' zawe, kandi akaguha umwanya wo kuba uwo uri we. Mwuzuzanye, kandi mukundana.

scenario: A young girl feeling pressured by friends to do something she's uncomfortable with
instruction: Ndagira ngo menye, ese niba mvuga 'Oya' ku byo inshuti zanjye zinkoresha, zizankunda?
output: Inshuti z'ukuri zizakwumva kandi zizakwubaha, nubwo waba wanze gukora ibyo bashaka. Niba bakomeza kugutoteza cyangwa kuguta, abo si inshuti nziza. Kwiyubaha ni ingenzi cyane kuruta gushakisha ubucuti.

scenario: A young girl struggling with how she looks and comparing herself to others
instruction: Hari umuntu unkoraho ibintu bibi ku mubiri wanjye. Nagira nte ngo niyizere?
output: Amagambo y'abandi ntagomba kukuvutsa agaciro. Wibuke ko uri umukobwa w'agaciro. Vuga uti 'Amagambo yawe ntacyo ampinduraho.' Wibande ku ngaruka zawe nziza, kandi ukore ibyo ukunda. Kwiyakira ni ingenzi.

scenario: A young girl asking how to stay safe when walking alone or in public places
instruction: Niba mbona umuntu ankurikira, nagira nte?
output: Jya uhindura inzira cyangwa ukinjire mu iduka ririmo abantu benshi. Ushobora kandi kuvuza induru cyangwa gukoresha telefone. Icy'ingenzi ni uko ugomba kumva ufite umutekano. Bwira umuntu mukuru ako kanya.

scenario: A young girl asking how to know if someone's behavior towards her is wrong
instruction: Umuntu arimo kunkoraho ibidasanzwe. Ese nkwiriye kwihorera?
output: Oya, ntugomba kwihorera. Bwira umuntu mukuru wizeye ako kanya, kandi uti 'Oya, sinshaka.' Ibyo ntibikwiye kukubaho. Ufite uburenganzira bwo kumva ufite umutekano.

scenario: A young girl asking how to say no when she feels uncomfortable
instruction: Niba mvuga 'Oya', ese hari uburyo bwo kubikora ntakaye?
output: Vuga 'Oya' mu buryo buhamye, urugero: 'Oya, sinabikora ubu.' Ntugomba gusobanura impamvu. Gutanga imbago ni uburyo bwo kwiyubaha no kurinda umutekano wawe.

scenario: A young girl asking who she can talk to if something bad happens
instruction: Niba umuntu wizeye adahari, ni ba nde nshobora kubwira mu ishuri?
output: Bwira umwarimu, umuyobozi w'ishuri, cyangwa umukozi ushinzwe imibereho myiza mu ishuri. Abo bantu bazagufasha gushaka ubufasha. Icy'ingenzi ni uko utabika ikibazo wenyine.

scenario: A young girl asking about staying safe on the internet and social media
instruction: Ni iki kibi cyo gutanga ifoto yanjye ku muntu ntazi kuri internet?
output: Iyo utanze ifoto ku muntu utazi, ashobora kuyikoresha mu buryo butandukanye. Menya ko ukeneye kurinda amabanga yawe. Kwitonda ku bya internet ni ingenzi.

scenario: A young girl asking what personal information she should not share
instruction: Ese ni byiza gutanga nomero y'indangamuntu yanjye ku bantu bo kuri internet?
output: Oya, na rimwe ntugomba gutanga nomero y'indangamuntu yawe cyangwa ya mama wawe kuri internet. Ibyo ni ibanga rikomeye. Kwirinda ni ingenzi.

scenario: A young girl asking what to do when someone gives her unwanted attention
instruction: Umuntu ahoze ankoraho ibintu bibi mu bwihisho. Nagira nte?
output: Hagarara, vuga uti 'Oya, ndashaka ko undeka,' kandi ubitse ako kanya. Bwira umuntu mukuru wizeye cyangwa umuyobozi. Ibyo ntibikwiye kukubaho.

scenario: A young girl asking how to identify safe places and people
instruction: Ahantu h'umutekano ni iki? Hari uburyo bwo kubona ahantu heza nko muri Kigali?
output: Ahantu h'umutekano ni ahantu uhumeka, aho wumva uri wenyine kandi ufite umutekano. Ushobora kwigira mu rusengero, igipolisi, cyangwa aho abantu benshi bari. Kwitonda ni ingenzi.

scenario: A young girl experiencing constant worry and fear about school or social situations
instruction: Iyo mfite ubwoba bwinshi, ndumva ngiye kurwara umutwe. Nagira nte ngo nihangane?
output: Guhangayika kenshi gushobora gutera umutwe. Gerageza guhumeka, koga mu mazi ashyushye, cyangwa gukora siporo. Menya ko ukeneye gukira. Niba bikomeye, vugana n'umuganga.

scenario: A young girl feeling sad, hopeless, and losing interest in activities she used to enjoy
instruction: Niba ndi guhangana n'agahinda, ese gukina umuziki bishobora gufasha?
output: Yego, kumva umuziki ukunda cyangwa gukina igikoresho cya muzika bishobora gufasha. Umuziki ugabanya agahinda kandi ugatuma umutima uba mwiza. Kwita ku buzima ni ingenzi.

scenario: A young girl feeling overwhelmed with school, family, or social pressures
instruction: Ni iki kibi cyo kwikina (procrastinate) cyane?
output: Kwikina (procrastination) byongerera 'stress' kuko uguma utuwe. Gerageza gukora imirimo yawe mu byiciro, kandi ufate umwanya wo kuruhuka. Kwihangana ni ingenzi.

scenario: A young girl struggling with low self-confidence and self-worth
instruction: Hari abandi bankina ku mubiri. Nagira nte ngo niyizere?
output: Amagambo y'abandi ntagomba kukuvutsa agaciro. Wibuke ko uri umukobwa w'agaciro. Vuga uti 'Amagambo yawe ntacyo ampinduraho.' Shyiraho intego nkawe, kandi ukomeze kugerageza. Kwizera kwawe kuzatuma uhagarara neza.

scenario: A young girl having difficulty managing her emotions and reactions
instruction: Iyo narakaye cyane, umutima wanjye uhita usimbagurika. Nagira nte ngo ntange umwanya wo gutuza?
output: Iyo ugiye kurakara, humeka cyane, jya ku ruhande, cyangwa uvuge uti 'ndasubira nyuma.' Kora ibi kugeza igihe wumva utuje. Kwigenzura ni ingenzi.

scenario: A young girl struggling to adapt to changes in her life or family
instruction: Ababyeyi banjye barimo gutandukana, kandi ndahangayitse. Nagira nte ngo menye guhangana n'ibihe bishya?
output: Ni byiza kwemera ko ukeneye umwanya wo kwemera impinduka. Menya ko ukeneye kuvuga ibyiyumviro byawe ku muntu wizeye. Kwita ku buzima bwawe bwite ni ingenzi. Wibuke ko utari ikosa ryawe, kandi ibi bizashira.

scenario: A young girl asking how to take care of her mental and emotional well-being
instruction: Ni ibiki byo kwikora nshobora gukora mu buriri kugira ngo nduhuke?
output: Mu buriri, shaka umwanya wo gusoma igitabo, gutega amatwi umuziki woroshye, cyangwa kwandika ibyo wize mu gitabo. Irinde gufata telefone cyangwa 'tablet' mu buriri. Ibyo bizagufasha kuruhuka neza, kandi bikurinde ibyiyumviro by'ibibi.

scenario: A young girl experiencing bullying at school or online
instruction: Umuntu arimo kunsetsa ku ishuri, kandi simenya icyo gukora. Nagira nte ngo nihangane?
output: Niba bakina ku mubiri wawe cyangwa bakwangiza, irinde kumva ugira uburakari. Menya ko atari ikosa ryawe, kandi ko ari bo bafite ikibazo. Bwira umuntu mukuru ako kanya. Kwirinda ni byiza kuruta kwishora mu ntonganya.

scenario: A young girl feeling isolated and disconnected from others
instruction: Nihumva ndi wenyine, byandenze. Hari uburyo bwo gukira?
output: Shaka umuntu, nka inshuti ya hafi, umuryango, cyangwa umujyanama wo kuganira. Jya ugera aho abantu babarirwa. Menya ko abandi nabo banyura muri ibyo. Kwiyizera bizagufasha kubona inshuti nshya.

scenario: A young girl having difficulty expressing her feelings and needs
instruction: Kuvugisha inshuti zanjye birangora. Nagira nte ngo mbe mushya mu mvugo?
output: Menya ibyo ushaka kuvuga, wivuge buhoro kandi mu mvugo igaragara. Shakisha abantu uzagiraho inshuti. Niba bigoye, andika ibyiyumviro byawe, hanyuma ubihe umuntu wizeye. Uko ugenda uganira ni ko ugenda uba mushya.

scenario: A young girl who has experienced a traumatic event and needs support
instruction: Kuba mwaranyuze mu kibazo gikomeye, ese mfite umutekano? Hari icyo nshobora gukora kugira ngo ntekereze ibyiza?
output: Yego, ufite umutekano. Wemerere umutima wawe kurohuka. Gerageza gukora ibyo usanzwe ukunda gukora, kandi ushakishe ubufasha bw'umujyanama. Wibuke ko igihe kirekire kizagufasha gukira. Kwita ku buzima bwawe ni ingenzi.

scenario: A young girl asking how to become stronger and bounce back from difficulties
instruction: Ni iki nshobora gukora kugira ngo ntekereze ibyiza mu bibazo bikomeye?
output: Gerageza kumenya ko ibibazo bizashira. Shakisha ibyiza mu buzima bwawe, kandi wibande ku ngaruka zawe nziza. Kwizera no gukora siporo byoroshye birafasha. Kwigira imbaraga bizagufasha kumenya guhangana n'ibibazo.

scenario: A young girl asking about her first period, what to expect, and how to manage it
instruction: Igihe cy'ukwezi cyanjye ntikimara iminsi imwe buri kwezi. Ese ndi murwayi?
output: Igihe cy'ukwezi (imihango) cy'umukobwa ntabwo buri gihe kiba kimara iminsi imwe cyangwa kigera ku gihe kimwe buri kwezi. Ni ibisanzwe, cyane cyane mu gihe cy'ubukumi. Ariko niba bikubaho igihe kinini cyane, cyangwa amaraso aba menshi cyane, ni byiza kuganira n'umuganga. Kutagerageza kubara umubare w'iminsi.

scenario: A young girl asking about how her body changes during puberty
instruction: Ni izihe ndwara z'imyororokere nkwiriye kwirinda cyangwa kumenya?
output: Ni byiza kumenya ku bijyanye n'indwara zandurira mu mibonano mpuzabitsina, nka SIDA (HIV) n'izindi. Kwirinda ni ingenzi: kuganira n'ababyeyi, kwirinda ubusambanyi, no kumenya uko wirinda. Niba ufite impungenge, vugana n'umuganga.

scenario: A young girl confused about physical changes happening to her body
instruction: Amabere yanjye ntabwo angana, rimwe riruta irindi. Ese ni ibintu bibi?
output: Oya, ni ibisanzwe rwose! Amabere y'abakobwa benshi ntabwo angana neza mu gihe cyo gukura. Ibi bishobora kuguma uko bihora, kandi nta kibazo gihari. Niba ufite ububabare, vugana n'umuganga.

scenario: A young girl asking about proper hygiene practices during her period
instruction: Ese ni byiza gukoresha imiti y'umubiri ku gitsina mu gihe cy'imihango?
output: Oya, si byiza gukoresha imiti y'umubiri (perfumes/sprays) ku gitsina, kabone niyo waba uri mu gihe cy'imihango. Iyo miti ishobora kuguha uburozi. Gukoresha amazi meza n'isabune gusa birahagije. Kwirinda ni ingenzi.

scenario: A young girl asking what consent means and how to recognize it
instruction: Ubwemeranye bugomba kuba busobanutse. Ese ni iki bivuze?
output: Ubwemeranye busobanutse bivuze ko umuntu avuze 'Yego' mu magambo agaragara cyangwa agaragaza ko yifuza. Ntibishobora kuba ubushake bwo guceceka cyangwa kumwenyura. Ni ngombwa ko buri wese yumva neza ibyemewe. Gutanga uburenganzira ni ingenzi.

scenario: A young girl asking about what makes a healthy relationship with peers
instruction: Ndagira ngo menye, ese mu mubano mwiza, dushobora gutongana?
output: Yego, gutongana bishobora kubaho mu mubano mwiza. Icy'ingenzi ni uburyo mutongana. Mugomba gutongana mu buryo bwubaha, mutirinda kuvugana nabi. Kwiga gutongana neza ni ingenzi.

scenario: A young girl feeling pressured by friends to do something she's uncomfortable with
instruction: Inshuti zanjye zinkina ku mubiri zivuga ko niba ntibigenzuye, ntashobora kuba umwe muri bo. Nagira nte?
output: Inshuti z'ukuri ntizishobora kuguhatira gukora ibyo udashaka. Wowe vuga 'Oya' mu buryo bwihuse kandi ushikamye. Niba bigoye, shakisha inshuti nshya zizagushyigikira. Agaciro kawe kari imbere ya byose.

scenario: A young girl struggling with how she looks and comparing herself to others
instruction: Amafoto yo kuri internet atuma nanga uko nsa. Nagira nte ngo menye kwiyakira?
output: Menya ko amafoto menshi yo kuri internet aba yahinduwe (edited) atari ukuri. Kwiyakira bivuze kwikundira uwo uri we, uko umeze, n'ibyo ushobora. Fata umwanya wo gukora ibyo ukunda, wibande ku ngaruka zawe nziza. Umubiri wawe ni mwiza, ukore uko bishoboka kugira ngo ukunde uko umeze.

scenario: A young girl asking how to stay safe when walking alone or in public places
instruction: Niba mbona umuntu ansatira mu muhanda, nakora iki?
output: Niba wumva ufite ubwoba, jya ugenda wihuta, cyangwa ukinjire ahantu hari abantu benshi, nk'iduka cyangwa ibiro. Ushobora no kuvuza induru ukavuga uti 'Nkeneye ubufasha!' kugira ngo abantu baguhagarare iruhande. Kwirinda ni byiza kuruta kwishora mu kaga.

scenario: A young girl asking how to know if someone's behavior towards her is wrong
instruction: Umuntu mukuru aransaba ko twahura mu bwihisho. Ese byaba bibi?
output: Ibyo si byiza na gato! Umuntu mukuru w'umwizerwa ntazigera agusaba gukora ibintu mu bwihisho utaraganiriye n'ababyeyi bawe. Niba bikubayeho, bwira umuntu mukuru wizeye ako kanya, kandi ntugere aho yagutumye. Kwitonda ni ngombwa cyane.

scenario: A young girl asking how to say no when she feels uncomfortable
instruction: Hari umuntu uhagaritse, ndashaka kumubwira 'Oya' ariko birandenga. Nagira nte?
output: Gutanga imbago (boundaries) ni ingenzi cyane. Ni uburenganzira bwawe bwo kuvuga 'Oya' nta mpamvu, kandi ntugomba gusobanurira impamvu. Bwira umuntu uti 'Ndabona atari byiza', 'Oya, sinkeka ko nabikora', cyangwa 'Ibyo sinabikora.' Gira ijwi ryawe rigaragara kandi ry'ikimanzu, kandi wifate neza.

scenario: A young girl asking who she can talk to if something bad happens
instruction: Ni bangahe abantu nkwiriye kugira ngo mba nizeye neza?
output: Ni byiza kugira byibuze abantu babiri (2) cyangwa batatu (3) b'abantu bakuru b'umwizerwa. Iyo umwe adahari cyangwa utarabonye umwanya wo kumubwira, ubasha kuganira n'undi. Abo bantu bagomba kuba bakumva, bakaguha umwanya, kandi bakagushyigikira.

scenario: A young girl asking about staying safe on the internet and social media
instruction: Niki nkwiriye kwirinda gukora kuri 'social media' kugira ngo ngume mfite umutekano?
output: Ntugomba guha abantu batazwi amazina yawe, nomero za telefoni, cyangwa ifoto yawe. Irinde kuvuga n'abantu utazi mu buzima busanzwe, kandi ntujye guhura n'umuntu wahuriye nawe kuri internet wenyine. Tekereza mbere yo kohereza cyangwa kwakira ibintu bififitse. Kubika amabanga yawe ni ingenzi.

scenario: A young girl asking what personal information she should not share
instruction: Ni ibiki byanjye byihariye ntagomba na rimwe gusangiza abantu?
output: Amafoto yawe cyangwa ya bagenzi bawe yihariye, nomero y'indangamuntu, nomero za konti, nomero za telefoni, imyirondoro y'ababyeyi bawe, n'aho utuye. Ibi byose bigomba kuguma mu bwihisho. Izi ni "Informations Personnelles" zikwiriye gukomeza kuba iz'ibanga ryawe.

scenario: A young girl asking what to do when someone gives her unwanted attention
instruction: Hari umuntu unyitaho kandi ntacyo mushaka. Nagira nte?
output: Ubwa mbere, bwira uwo muntu mu buryo busanzwe ariko bwihuse uti: 'Ndashaka ko undeka.' Niba akomeje, menya ko ushobora kumusiga, ugenda ukinjira mu bantu benshi, cyangwa ukabwira umuntu mukuru wizeye ngo agufashe. Ntugomba kwihanganira ibyo udashaka.

scenario: A young girl asking how to identify safe places and people
instruction: Nabasha nte kumenya ahantu h'umutekano n'abantu b'umutekano?
output: Ahantu h'umutekano ni ahantu uhumeka, aho wumva uri wenyine kandi ufite umutekano, nk'ikigo cy'amashuri, urusengero, cyangwa kwa Mama wawe. Abantu b'umutekano ni abakubaha, bakumva, barakutinyana kandi bagashyigikira. Uwo muntu azakubaho kandi akaba inshuti yawe ya hafi.

scenario: A young girl experiencing constant worry and fear about school or social situations
instruction: Ndagira ngo menye, ese guhangayika bihinduka indwara gute?
output: Guhangayika (worry) biba indwara iyo biba byinshi cyane, bigatuma ubuzima bwawe bwa buri munsi bugorana. Ibyo bishobora gutuma uhora ufite ubwoba, kugira umutima usimbagurika, cyangwa kubura ibitotsi. Niba ibi biba kenshi, ni byiza kuganira n'umujyanama cyangwa umuganga.

scenario: A young girl feeling sad, hopeless, and losing interest in activities she used to enjoy
instruction: Niba ndi guhangana n'agahinda, ni iki nshobora gukora kugira ngo nibeshye?
output: Nubwo bigoye, gerageza gukora ibyo usanzwe ukunda gukora (nko gusoma, gukina, cyangwa kumva indirimbo). Kurya neza, kuryama, no gukina siporo ni ingenzi cyane. Vugana n'inshuti zawe zizaguha umwanya, kandi wibuke ko atari ikosa ryawe. Ukeneye gukira.

scenario: A young girl feeling overwhelmed with school, family, or social pressures
instruction: Iyo 'stress' indega, umutima wanjye uhita usimbagurika. Nagira nte ngo ntange umwanya wo kuruhuka?
output: Iyo 'stress' ibayeho, humeka cyane, cyangwa ugerageze kuvuga ibintu 5 ubona, 4 wumva, 3 uhumeka, 2 ugeraho, 1 uva. Kwirinda guhagarika imirimo, gufata umwanya wo gukina, no kuruhuka. Urubanza rwawe rukwiriye kugira umwanya wo gukira.

output: Amagambo y'abandi ntagomba kukuvutsa agaciro. Wibuke ko uri umukobwa w'agaciro. Vuga uti 'Amagambo yawe ntacyo ampinduraho.' Shyiraho intego nkawe, kandi ukomeze kugerageza. Kwizera kwawe kuzatuma uhagarara neza.

instruction: Ibyiyumviro byanjye birahindagurika cyane. Nagira nte ngo menye kubigenzura neza?
output: Gerageza kumenya impamvu ibyiyumviro byawe bihinduka. Ushobora kwandika ibikubabaje mu gitabo. Kuruhuka neza, kurya neza, no gukina siporo birafasha. Menya ko byiza byose ari ngombwa. Humeka cyane.

instruction: Impinduka z'ubuzima zituma nshaka kuguma mu buriri. Hari uburyo bwo kwiyemeza?
output: Tangira ugenda gake, wiyemeze gukora ikintu gito. Ushobora kwigira gusa iminota 10 cyangwa kuvugana n'inshuti. Kwihangana no kwiyemeza bizagufasha kumenyera impinduka. Kwizera ni ingenzi.

instruction: Ni iki nshobora gukora kugira ngo ntekereze ibyiza mu bibazo bikomeye?
output: Gerageza kumenya ko ibibazo bizashira. Shakisha ibyiza mu buzima bwawe, kandi wibande ku ngaruka zawe nziza. Kwizera no gukora siporo byoroshye birafasha. Kwigira imbaraga bizagufasha kumenya guhangana n'ibibazo.

scenario: A young girl asking about her first period, what to expect, and how to manage it
instruction: Igihe cy'ukwezi cyanjye ntikimara iminsi imwe buri kwezi. Ese ndi murwayi?
output: Igihe cy'ukwezi (imihango) cy'umukobwa ntabwo buri gihe kiba kimara iminsi imwe cyangwa kigera ku gihe kimwe buri kwezi. Ni ibisanzwe, cyane cyane mu gihe cy'ubukumi. Ariko niba bikubaho igihe kinini cyane, cyangwa amaraso aba menshi cyane, ni byiza kuganira n'umuganga. Kutagerageza kubara umubare w'iminsi.

scenario: A young girl asking about how her body changes during puberty
instruction: Ni izihe ndwara z'imyororokere nkwiriye kwirinda cyangwa kumenya?
output: Ni byiza kumenya ku bijyanye n'indwara zandurira mu mibonano mpuzabitsina, nka SIDA (HIV) n'izindi. Kwirinda ni ingenzi: kuganira n'ababyeyi, kwirinda ubusambanyi, no kumenya uko wirinda. Niba ufite impungenge, vugana n'umuganga.

scenario: A young girl confused about physical changes happening to her body
instruction: Amabere yanjye ntabwo angana, rimwe riruta irindi. Ese ni ibintu bibi?
output: Oya, ni ibisanzwe rwose! Amabere y'abakobwa benshi ntabwo angana neza mu gihe cyo gukura. Ibi bishobora kuguma uko bihora, kandi nta kibazo gihari. Niba ufite ububabare, vugana n'umuganga.

scenario: A young girl asking about proper hygiene practices during her period
instruction: Ese ni byiza gukoresha imiti y'umubiri ku gitsina mu gihe cy'imihango?
output: Oya, si byiza gukoresha imiti y'umubiri (perfumes/sprays) ku gitsina, kabone niyo waba uri mu gihe cy'imihango. Iyo miti ishobora kuguha uburozi. Gukoresha amazi meza n'isabune gusa birahagije. Kwirinda ni ingenzi.

scenario: A young girl asking what consent means and how to recognize it
instruction: Niba mbanje kwemeranya, nshobora guhindura ibyemezo byanjye? ese ndashobora kuvuga 'Oya' nyuma?
output: Yego, ubwemeranye bugomba kuba bushobora guhagarara igihe icyo aricyo cyose. Niba wemeye gukora ikintu, ariko nyuma ukumva udashaka, ufite uburenganzira bwo kuvuga 'Oya.' 'Oya' iba 'Oya' rwose. Ni uburenganzira bwawe bwo kwiyemeza.

scenario: A young girl asking about what makes a healthy relationship with peers
instruction: Ni iki nshobora gukora kugira ngo nige kubwizwa ukuri mu mubano w'inshuti?
output: Ukwizera n'ukuri ni ingenzi. Vuga ibyiyumviro byawe mu buryo bwiza kandi bwubaka, kandi utegereze ko n'abandi bakubwiza ukuri. Iyo umuntu ahisha byinshi, uwo si umubano mwiza. Kwizera bizagufasha mu mubano.
